K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:323a-1: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:323a-2: bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:323a-3: 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:323b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung @323b thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad dang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:323b-1: 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo khyab par stsal ba la ye shes rin po che sna tshogs 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:323b-2: yon tan dpag tu med par rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:323b-3: lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che'i glo 'bur gyis mdzes bo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:323b-4: rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad so so ma yin ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes kun tu 'khyil pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:323b-5: ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:323b-6: rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad du gyur pa'i tshad dpag tu med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:323b-7: ye shes rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:323b-13: ro sna tshogs dang; reg bya sna tshogs kyis phyogs bcur 'khrigs par rang byung la mi bsgribs par gsal ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas klubs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324a-1: pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324a-2: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa'i phyi dang nang med par kun tu yang nang du gyur pa na mi 'jigs pa seng+ge'i khri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324a-3: stobs kyi glang po'i khri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324a-5: dbang gi rma bya'i khri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324a-6: thogs pa med ba nam mkha' lding gi khri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324a-7: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324a-8: gos pa med pa padma rin po che'i gdan la sku mdun dang rgyab med pa thams cad du yang zhal thal le bar gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324a-9: bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad du sku gsung thugs sna tshogs par kun tu snang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324a-10: lhun gyis grub pa'i sku gsung thugs chen po las thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324a-12: ye shes rin po che'i phyag 'bar ba can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324a-13: sku gsung thugs bsam gyi sa mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum ngang ldan pa 'di lta ste /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324b-4: de dag kun kyang mthing ga dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324b-16: til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324b-17: de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324b-18: byang chub chen po rdo rje thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324b-19: byang chub chen po rdo rje snom pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324b-20: byang chub chen po rdo rje myong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324b-21: btsun mo mthong bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324b-24: myong bar bya ba'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324b-25: byang chub chen po mthong byed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324b-26: byang chub chen po rdo rje thos byed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324b-27: byang chub chen po rdo rje snom pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:324b-28: byang chub chen po myong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325a-2: 'joms pa chen po reg byed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325a-3: 'joms pa chen po reg shes dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325a-4: btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa dang; chad par ma yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325a-5: bdag tu ma yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325a-6: mtshan mar ma yin pa la sogs pa de lta bu'i tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325a-7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshegs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325a-10: yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325a-14: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325a-15: dbang sgyur ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs rang rang snang ba nyid ting nge 'dzin gzugs brnyan sgyu ma rnam dag gsal ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325a-18: thugs yon tan 'phrin las sel med pa'i yid bzhin nor bu rin po che mi zad par ldan pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325a-19: zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325a-20: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325a-21: glang gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje yid @325b kun tu bzang po thams cad ma lus pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshul rdo rjes btsun mo chos bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo la 'jug par gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-1: aom chos kyi chos nyid shes bya'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-2: kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-3: ma g-yos rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-4: bdag yin bdag gi spyod yul ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-5: phyag rgya sna tshogs so sor gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-6: nub phyogs 'og min gnas mchog tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-7: ma chags padma'i gdan bting ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-8: dus gsum rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-9: rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-10: phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-11: dbang dang skal min gsal ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-12: nang dang phyi rol lcags dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-13: rgyal ba yongs kyi sbas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-14: sus kyang gting dpag dka' ba de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-15: kun tu bzang po nyid kyis gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-16: zhes brjod pas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mo la 'jug par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-17: zhugs nas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yid kun tu bzang po dang gnyis su med pa'i longs spyod bde pa la mnyam par gnas te ched du brjod pa brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-18: sems kyi sems nyid byed pa'i gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-19: kun tu bzang po rdo rje yid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:325b-20: ye shes drug gi rang bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-1: phyogs mngon dga' bsam yas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-2: n'i la lta bu'i gter 'byin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-4: rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-5: byang chub mchog gis nang gdan dgrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-6: mnyam sbyor padma'i gdan la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-7: 'gro don byang chub sems bskyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-8: 'gro lnga skye bzhi dbang du bsdus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-9: sku gsung thugs gnas dbang bskur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-10: zhes brjod pas thams cad mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje nyid du gsal bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-11: zhugs pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin dbyer med pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-12: ae ma ho rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-13: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-14: skye mched khams rnams mang po kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-16: sa chu spyan dang m'a ma k'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-17: me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-18: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-19: srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-20: thams cad ma lus chos so cog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326a-21: sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326b-0: sangs @326b rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326b-1: sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326b-2: zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326b-4: ae ma ho phyogs bcu'i stong khams ye shes dben //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326b-5: srid pa gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326b-6: snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326b-7: phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326b-8: thams cad mchog gi snying po bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326b-9: gzhan du rgyal bas chos mi 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326b-10: nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326b-11: btsal kyang rgyal pas mi rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326b-12: zhes brjod pas thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326b-13: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid des pa las /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326b-15: ae ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326b-17: skye ba med las thams cad skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:326b-18: skyes pa nyid ni skye ba med //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:327a-21: ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu gsang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:327b-1: 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig pa la 'gro ba lnga'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab bar smin pa la thugs rje chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po skyes nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:327b-2: ae ma ho bde gshegs snying po las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:327b-3: rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:327b-4: sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:327b-5: gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:327b-6: bdag dang bdag gis so sor 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:327b-7: sus kyang mi 'ching bcings med de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:327b-8: bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:327b-9: rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:327b-10: nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa 'dor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:327b-11: bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:327b-12: ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:327b-13: bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:327b-14: ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:327b-15: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid des pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:327b-16: don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub sems ye shes su bskyed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328a-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thugs rje chen po byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa drug da bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung @328a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328a-1: dang thugs rdo rje las bton to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328a-2: bton nas kyang las kyi dbang gis snrel zhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328a-3: yan man gyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i re rer thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das re res 'dul pa rnam bzhis 'gro ba lnga'i don mdzad de bltams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328a-8: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328a-9: cho 'phrul chen po ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328a-10: mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa ston pa'i thub pa dus bzhi kun tu mkhyen pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328a-11: thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud du kun tu mkhyen pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328a-12: rdzu 'phrul gyi snyan gyis kun tu gzigs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328a-13: rdzu 'phrul gyi snyan gyis kun tu gsan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328a-14: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho gas kun tu don spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328a-15: zag pa med pa'i kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i mngon par shes pa drug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328a-16: kun tu sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328a-17: kun tu thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328a-18: kun tu zhal bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328a-19: kun tu gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328b-0: bsam @328b gyis mi khyab pa grangs med par yang phyogs bcur snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328b-1: de ltar snang bar gyur nas ji snyed pa'i thub pa chen po snying rje'i go 'phang chen po thams cad kyang 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328b-2: 'dul ba'i dbang gis lha dang mi'i theg pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328b-3: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328b-4: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328b-6: bla na med pa'i theg pas ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnyen por chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328b-9: de dag thams cad kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i phyi nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'dzin pa 'khrul pa la dgongs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328b-10: las dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328b-11: las dang las kyi 'bras bus mi gos par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328b-12: gos pa med pa'i ston pa'i mthar thug go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328b-13: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'khor ba'i skyon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328b-14: mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:328b-17: snying po bla med ji snyed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-2: mtha' dang bral bas bdag med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-4: ae ma ho ji srid 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-5: ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-6: stong gi 'jig rten bsam yas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-8: rtog pa'i bag chags stug po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-9: mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-10: de nyid ji bzhin dbyings nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-11: rang bzhin bdag med tshul gcig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-12: rang bzhin nyid la nyams pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-13: yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-14: bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-15: de nyid ngo bo nyid dbyings pas; ;rnam dag dbyings nyid tshul gcig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-16: bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-17: log par rtog pa tsam nyid las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-18: phra zhing zab pa yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-19: log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-20: gzhan du g-yo ba ci yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-21: log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyun nyid kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-22: gzhi rtsa med de skad cig ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-23: rnam par dag ba'i dbyings nyid tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-24: nyid la dbang sgyur nyid spyod phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-25: bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329a-26: rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-0: theg pa bzhi @329b yis nges 'byung la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-1: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-2: yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-3: rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-4: sangs rgyas mya ngan yod mi 'da'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-5: chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-6: ma rig smin mdzad gdul ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-8: 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang; ;dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-9: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-10: ji snyed 'jig rten mtha' klas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-11: phyogs bcur kun tu rab grags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-12: gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-13: rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-14: sde snod kun dang rgyud kun tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-15: ston pa'i thub pa bsam yas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-17: chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-18: ston pas don dang mthun phyogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-19: ming nying tshig tu brtags nas bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-20: ston cing tshig la dngos po med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-21: ces brjod pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis lhun gyis grub pa chen por gsal bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:329b-22: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lhun gyis grub pa gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330a-2: rgyud drug skye 'gag lus dang longs spyod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330a-3: gnas dang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa; ;log rtog nyid las gzhan du ci yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330a-4: stod nyid bdag med ye mkhyen rang rig thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330a-5: dmigs bya dmigs byed med par dran dbang sgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330a-6: ngo mtshar sku gsung yon tan zhing khams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330a-7: gzhan na med de de nyid de ltar yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330a-8: zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330a-9: thub pa drug gis sprul pa grangs med pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa yang de dag tu 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330a-11: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330a-12: chos thams cad gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330a-13: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor yod par bstan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330a-14: rigs rgyud drug tu yang bshad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330a-15: de la chos nyid kyi rigs ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330a-16: thams cad kun la yang yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330a-17: nam mkha' yang kun la khyab par gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330a-18: de ltar chos kyi dbyings dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-0: nam mkhas kun la khyab kyang rnam par thar pa'i don @330b ma rtog sa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-1: me long g-yas g-yogs pa dang 'dra ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-2: gzugs brnyan snang ba'i bya ba byed mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-3: zhes gsungs nas yang 'di skad rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-4: mnyam nyid don rtogs rang rig rgyal po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-5: rgya mtsho chen por chu klung 'bab pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-6: bla med don rtogs thabs chen 'di dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-7: rnam pa'i theg pa bsam yas ma lus 'dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-9: bdag med gnyis rtogs pha rol phyin rdzogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-10: sa bcu rim gyis bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-11: sangs rgyas sar 'gro go 'phang thob pa'i lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-12: bden pa gnyis kyis rab tu thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-13: phyi nang rten 'brel sgyu ma mig yor tshul shes pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-14: dngos po gzugs la thogs med rab tu 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-15: dge bshes mi slob rang gi rig pas rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-16: byang chub sar 'gro yid bzhin bde ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-17: bden bzhi don rtogs rab tu spong ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-18: ye shes bcu drug cha sbyangs rab zhi ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-19: rgyun zhugs la sogs rim par sbyangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-20: nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sa ru 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-21: theg pa gang du bstan pa ma nges pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-22: yang na kun la mthun nas 'jam par 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-23: yang na nges med 'di zhes brtag tu med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:330b-24: 'di ni ma nges rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-1: spyod cing mi dge spong byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-2: 'dod khams lha dang mi ru skye ba'i rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-3: tshad med bzhi spyod mi g-yo sgom byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-4: tshangs gnas la sogs skye ba'i rgyu yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-5: chos kyi dbyings kyis kun tu khyab gyur kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-6: rang rig rtogs pa'i skal dang mi ldan ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-7: ji ltar dmus long mdun du mdog bstan bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-8: 'di ni skal med rigs chad sa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-9: chos kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyab pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-10: bla med theg pa bsam yas gsungs pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-11: so so rang rig blo la snang bar zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-12: ngan song 'gro drug sna tshogs rgyu ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-13: 'khrul pa'i blo log rtog pa nyid snang ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-14: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings la 'gyur ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-15: mi dmigs rang rig goms byas bla na med pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-16: log rtog bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-17: dngos med mi sdug sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-18: yang dag shes pa'i rang rig blo med na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-19: bde gshegs zhing yang ngan song gnas su mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-20: theg mchog mnyam pa'i don nyid rtogs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-21: ngan song gnas nyid 'og min dga' ldan gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331a-22: nam mkha'i dbyings ni de nyid bsam yas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331b-0: nyi zla gza' skar mtshan ma glog 'gyur @331b dang; ;'ja' tshon sprin mang sna tshogs 'khrugs gyur kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331b-1: nam mkha'i dbyings la gyur cing nyams pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331b-2: mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings ni bsam yas par /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331b-3: sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las rmad byung dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331b-4: 'jig rtog gtso mchog ma lus thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331b-5: 'khrul 'khor sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnam mang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331b-6: de bzhin nyid la 'phel zhing bri ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331b-7: ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331b-8: rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331b-9: thams cad la chos nyid kyi rgyu yod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331b-11: rigs rgyud so sor dbye ba'i mdor bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331b-12: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje'i dbyings su chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g-yo bar chos thams cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331b-14: rab tu brtan gyur aa dkar las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331b-15: shin tu phra ba'i aa rnams spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331b-16: phyogs kun gang bar gsal gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331b-18: de las ming chags gsal bar kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:331b-19: spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-1: ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-2: rten 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-8: pa pha ba bha ma; ya wa ra la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-15: 'di dag phyung bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa rnam pa drug tu g-yos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-17: kun tu g-yos nas chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-18: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do; ;aa ni stong dang mi stong gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-19: dbu ma dmigs su yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-20: thams cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-21: yi ge'i phreng ba nyid la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-22: aa nyid sna tshogs bar snang ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-23: ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-24: sgra yi ming gis thams cad bsdus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-25: mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-26: ae ma ho ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi; ;'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i ming //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-27: tshig rnams ma lus 'dzin pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-28: sna tshogs don kun smra zhing ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-29: dngos med yi ge rang bzhin sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-30: bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-31: dbyibs dang kha dog ming tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332a-32: rol pa cir yang sprul cing ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-0: phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa @332b yi; ;ye shes sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-1: dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-2: yi ge mgo nas ksha la rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-3: sems ni rang bzhin yi ge ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-4: yi ge dngos po yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-5: dmigs med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-6: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-7: gsung thugs ni ngo mtshar gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-9: dbyings la dbyings kyis bris pa ste; ;yi ge zhes ni de phyir brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-10: mgo ni ma nor lam yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-11: tsheg ni shes rab ming du smras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-12: shad ni thabs chen tshigs su gcod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-13: aa ni skye med de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-14: tha ni sgyu 'phrul rdo rje nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-15: ta ni snang ba'i sgyu 'phrul nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-16: da ni sgyu 'phrul yid bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-17: dha ni sgyu 'phrul rnam dag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-18: na ni kun tu sgyu 'phrul nyid; ;tha ni dra bas mngon rdzogs nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-19: ta ni dra bas brtan pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-20: da ni dra bas lham me nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-21: dha ni dra bas 'khyil ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-22: na ni dra bas kun tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-23: ka ni spyan gyi thugs kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-24: kha ni snyan gyi thugs kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-25: ga ni shangs kyi thugs kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-26: gha ni ljags kyi thugs kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-27: nga ni thugs kyang 'jig byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-28: tsa ni spyan gyi sku yi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-29: tsha ni snyan gyi sku yi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-30: dza ni shangs kyi sku yi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:332b-31: dzha ni ljags kyi sku yi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-1: pa'o; ;pa ni spyan gyi gsung gi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-2: pha ni snyan gyi gsung mchog ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-3: ba ni shangs kyi gsung mchog yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-4: bha ni ljags kyi gsung gi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-5: ma ni gsung yang 'jig par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-6: ya ni skye ba rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-7: wa ni gnas pa dag pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-8: ra ni 'jig pa dag pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-9: la ni stong pa dag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-10: sha ni rtag med dag pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-11: sha ni chad pa'ang yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-12: sa ni mtha' bral bdag med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-13: ha ni mtshan ma med pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-14: ksha ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-15: ai ni rdul snyed lha rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-16: a'i ni rdul snyed lha ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-17: au ni rdul snyed mi rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-18: a'u ni rdul snyed byol song rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-19: ae ni rdul snyed yi dvags su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-20: a'ee ni rdul snyed dmyal ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-21: ao ni thams cad 'jig par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-22: aoo ni thams cad 'jig pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-24: sku gsung thugs kyi phreng ba bsdus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-26: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333a-28: thabs dang shes rab dgyes sprin byang chub sems tshogs rgyu 'khor lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333b-0: 'bras bu rgyal ba'i @333b smin grub ngo mtshar ming tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333b-1: 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byin ba'i dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333b-2: 'da' bar mi mdzad dbang med rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i mthu chen yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333b-4: rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333b-5: zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi ge'i 'khor lor gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333b-6: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333b-7: yi ge'i phreng ba 'khor lo bkod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333b-8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333b-9: shin tu gsang ba'i gsang sngags kyi rgyud de'i phyi ba dang nang pa thabs kyi rgyud gzhan las khams bco brgyad du bstan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333b-10: gtsug lag thams cad las kyang khams bco brgyad du bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333b-12: shin tu zab ba'i phyir khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333b-13: lung gi spyi yang rgyud dang gsung rab thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin; gsang ba'i dbang po dang gsang ba'i yul gnyi ga yang skye mched dang khams thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir shin tu gsang bar gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333b-14: dkyil 'khor de dag shin tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir nyid la nyid ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:333b-15: ae ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-2: ngang gis dag mnyam ma rtogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-3: kun la yod cing rang bzhin gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-4: gzhan du min la shin tu gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-5: don nyid kyis ni gsang ba'i rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-6: mnyam pa'i rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-7: 'di ni byang chub snying po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-9: rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-10: dbang po yul du snang ba'i rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-12: phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-13: rigs lnga yab yum bcu ru 'byor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-14: skye mched khams rnams bco brgyad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-15: sems dpa' sems ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-16: thams cad byang chub sems ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-17: rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang por 'dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-18: rdo rje dbang po gsang ba'i thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-19: dbang po yul nyid shes rab dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-20: dbang po'i thugs ni rdo rje sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-21: thams cad 'byung ba'i gter nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-22: thams cad 'gro ba'i gnas nyid de; ;de yis ma bskyed gang yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-24: de las thams cad skye zhing 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-25: kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-26: bde ba byang chub sgrub pa'i rdzas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-27: de las bskyed cing de las spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-28: dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334a-29: dbang po rdo rje padmor ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-0: gnyis med byang chub sems @334b 'phro na; ;mi dmigs bde dang longs spyod 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-1: sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-2: gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-3: mchod pa'i lha mo rdzogs ldan bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-4: 'jug dang ldang dang gnas dang smon pa'i byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-5: g-yo dang bskyod dang ldan dang gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-7: bsdus dang 'khril ba'i don bsgrub phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-8: bsdams dang mi gtong dbang bsgyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-9: bde ba sgra snyan phyogs bcur sgrog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-10: shin tu sgeg pa'i gzi brjid 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-11: yid bzhin rin chen phreng bar 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-13: gzugs mdzes bskyod pas phyogs bcur g-yo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-14: kun tu tshim byed bro bsung thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-15: lha mdzes rin chen phung po 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-17: bdud rtsi bsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-19: gsang ba'i dbang po padmar ldan gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-20: chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-21: pha rol phyin bcu rgyu 'bras rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-22: sa bcu rim gyis bkod med rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-23: kun tu 'od gsal padma spyan yang rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-24: yi ge'i phreng ba 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-25: yang dag rdzogs chen thabs dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:334b-26: thabs dang shes rab bla med sa yang rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-0: bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs @335a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-3: de bzhin nyid kyi gsang mchog las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-4: khams ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-5: bco brgyad po ni rgyud gzhan bzhin; ;gsum ni de bzhin kun gyi bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-6: bco brgyad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-7: byang chub 'grub pa'i zhing yang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-8: bde ba 'byin pa'i rgyu yang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-9: gsang ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-10: dbang po rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-11: yul ni padma bde mchog dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-12: sems ni byang chub 'byung ba'i gter //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-13: dbang po yul sems ldan gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-14: gsang ba mchog gi 'phrul chen spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-15: dkyil 'khor rdul snyed grangs med dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-16: phun sum tshogs pa'i lhun grub rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-17: gsang ba mchog gis 'byin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-18: 'di ni rtse gcig yin par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-19: gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-20: lta ba dman la bshad byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-21: dus min par ni srog zad nas; ;mgo 'gas snying yang tshig par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-22: khab len gyis ni lcags sdud ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-23: mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-24: ngan song mi khom bskal par brgyud par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-25: de bas 'di ni shin tu gsang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335a-26: shes rab rgya chen blo zab yangs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335b-0: blo brtan snying rje che dang dad ldan ngang tshul bzang la @335b brten; ;gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335b-1: zhes nyid la yang nyid brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335b-2: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335b-3: khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsdus nas thams cad ma lus par dbyings su bkod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335b-4: de nas yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bkod pa las sgyu 'phrul rnam par spros pa 'di ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335b-5: rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335b-6: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335b-7: sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335b-8: yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335b-10: dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335b-11: phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335b-14: bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335b-15: longs spyod 'byung zhing ngan song sbyong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335b-17: nam mkha' rdo rje sra 'byung zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335b-20: 'jig rten khams ni gtor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335b-21: thams cad stong shing lhung bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335b-22: dgug dang gtang dang bcing dang dgrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:335b-23: gso dang gsad dang pham dang rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-2: ming tshig gzugs tshigs yid bzhin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-3: mun la snang byung ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-5: ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-6: dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-7: ma nyams shes shing yo byad ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-9: dus gsum rgyal bas thugs chud pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-10: dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-11: zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-12: 'phel 'grib med par 'byung ba ste; ;dngos po med las dngos po'i sprin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-14: dngos rnams nyid na dngos med par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-15: rtogs pa'i dbang bsgyur ting 'dzin yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-16: gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-17: de yis chos kyi dbyings ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-18: de phyir dngos dang dngos med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-19: 'jigs pas dmigs med shes par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-20: gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-21: pho mo ma yin ma ning min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-22: mtshan med ma yin rigs rgyud min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-23: kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-24: gnas su ma yin gang yang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-25: de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-26: thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336a-27: thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam yas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336b-0: tha dad min @336b la tha dad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336b-1: nang dang nang gi phyi rol pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336b-2: dkyil 'khor bsam yas ye shes rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336b-3: 'jigs med kun bzang phyag rgya mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336b-4: gang gis glang chen myos 'dra'i sems; ;mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336b-5: sngags dang phyag rgyas rab brtan na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336b-6: dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336b-7: zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336b-8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336b-9: ae ma'o snying por lam bcas pas; ;'jigs med dbyings nyid kun bzang phyag rgya mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336b-10: rang bzhin sku gsung thugs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336b-11: byang chub lhun grub bdal ba'i dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336b-12: snying po nyid ni snying por kun bcas kun tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336b-13: de nyid rdzogs pa'i ngang las dngos grub kun shar kun tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336b-15: rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336b-16: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336b-17: sgyu 'phrul sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:336b-18: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor las lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags 'chang rnams lha sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di don yod par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-2: thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-3: byang chub mchog tu nyi zla shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-4: de nyid bzhugs gnas yin par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-5: chos rnams thams cad bdag med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-6: dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-7: gcig dang spros pa thams cad med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-8: dkyil 'khor spros med zlum po'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-9: ye nas mya ngan 'das pa'i chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-10: ye shes rgyu dang 'bras bu ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-11: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-12: chos kyi 'khor lo yongs kyis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-13: thugs rje byin rlabs 'phros pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-14: ye shes bzhi yi dkyil 'khor spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-15: ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-16: byin rlabs ya mtshan bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-17: rang snang ba yi thabs las 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-18: bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-19: thugs rje rgyas pa'i gzhal yas khang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-20: dbus mtha' med par rgyas par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-22: de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-23: der 'gro lam stegs brgyad dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-24: rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-25: nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan khri 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-26: ye nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337a-28: zag med ye shes gter gyur pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337b-0: yid bzhin rin chen @337b 'bar ba'i gdan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337b-1: ye nas mnyam nyid mi 'da'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337b-2: ta la'i ljon shing rang bzhin gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337b-3: re ba yid bzhin skong ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337b-4: dpag bsam shing gi rin chen 'bar; ;yid bzhin rin chen rgyan gyis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337b-5: thams cad la ni dbang sgyur phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337b-6: 'jig rten lha chen rnams kyis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337b-7: gsang ba'i de nyid nges pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337b-8: 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337b-9: thams cad lha nyid rtag tu sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337b-10: thams cad ma lus dkyil 'khor mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337b-12: gzugs brnyan lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337b-14: byang chub sems dang tshogs mchog brten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337b-15: zhes nyid la nyid bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337b-16: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337b-17: shin tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsdus nas lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337b-18: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337b-19: ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:337b-20: dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-3: 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-4: gru chad bzhis brgyan par khyams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-5: kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-6: rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-7: dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-8: seng+ge glang chen rta dang khyung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-9: nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-10: nyi zla padma rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-11: gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-12: 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-13: g-yas nas mthong thos snom pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-14: myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-15: gru chad la ni mthong byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-16: thos byed snom byed myong byed rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-17: btsun mo dag dang bcas par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-18: bar khyams la ni thub drug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-19: mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-20: bya ba dang ni gnas par bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-21: sgo khyud bzhi la 'dzoms pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-22: btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-23: rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-25: autpal klu shing la sogs mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-26: mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-27: mthing ga dkar po ser le brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-28: ljang khu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338a-29: mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-0: gsal @338b 'tsher lhun stug gzi byin can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-3: dbus mtha' med par khyab pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-4: dkyil 'khor bsam pas lhun gyis grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-5: sku yi phyag rgya che mchog ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-6: de bzhin dbyings las ma g-yos kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-7: yang dag thar pa'i gzugs sku dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-8: 'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir; ;mthun byas sku ni sna tshogs ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-9: stong nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-10: tshul nyid dbyings las g-yos pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-11: ma g-yos bzhin du sna tshogs bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-12: de'i tshe mi mthun sna tshogs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-13: so so 'dra bar snang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-14: de bzhin nyid kyis ma bcos kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-15: las 'phro dbang gis so sor snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-16: dper na me long chu zla bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-17: de tshe 'gro drug thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-18: sdig spong gzugs su rnam par bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-19: dge tshul rnams la dgra bcom gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-20: rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-21: gzhan yang theg mchog rim pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-22: 'og min bla med gnas mchog tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-23: sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-24: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-25: de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra ste; ;sku yis chos rnams mjal bar ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-26: me long bstan pa'i tshul bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-27: dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:338b-28: 'khor gyis de bzhin sku bltas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-1: chub sgrib pa gting dpag med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-2: me long bzhin du sku la snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-3: de nas sa bcu rim gyis 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-4: bla med byang chub yang dag 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-5: chos sku dpag med brjod du med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-6: longs spyod zad med rin chen gter //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-7: sprul pa bye ba bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-8: mtshon dang dpe byad thams cad rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-9: spyod yul kun rtsa manda la; ;tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-10: thabs dang shes rab sa yi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-11: de la sogs te bsam yas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-12: skye shi med pa'i g-yung drung sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-13: nyon mongs kun gyi zhing du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-14: zad mi shes kyi gter du gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-15: rdo rje rig pa 'dzin gyi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-16: thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-17: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-18: de tshe sku lnga kun kyang rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-19: zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad dkyil 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba zhing gi rdul snyed du gsal bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339a-20: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i yon tan chen po'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339b-0: dmigs bya dmigs med mi dmigs dpag @339b med bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339b-1: ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod mi lang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339b-2: mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab pa'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339b-3: ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor rnams spro spros pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339b-4: ye nas kun khyab dkyil 'khor bsam yas zhing gi rdul snyed du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339b-5: ye nas rnam spros snying po kun gnas gnas pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339b-6: rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339b-7: aa ho zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339b-8: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339b-9: dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339b-10: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kyang nyid la nyid mnyes par mchod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339b-11: kun tu bzang po dgyes te phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas thams cad gzhal yas khang rin po che sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339b-12: tshad dpag tu med pa rgyas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339b-13: mtha' dbus med par khyab cing 'od zer sgrib pa med pa rang byung ba la bzhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339b-14: nyid kyi dbyings nyid 'phro ba dpag tshad med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339b-15: kun nas dkyil 'khor yongs su ma chad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339b-16: srid gsum yang dag mnyam sbyor spyod yul te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:339b-17: mtshan 'dzin 'das pa mchog gi rgyu las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-1: sgyur shin tu rnam par dag pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa 'og min gnas bzhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-3: gzung 'dzin bral ba'i bla med rjes 'dod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-4: 'jig rten 'khor gyi gtsos bkur dbang phyug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-5: gzhan dang 'jig rten phyogs bcu khams gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-6: bdud rtsi ro yis dga' ba bde chen 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-7: dug gsum dri bral bdud sde tshar gcod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-8: 'das dang ma byon de bzhin nyid du sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-9: shes rab thabs ldan nges pa'i don phyung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-10: rig pa'i thabs chen dbang sgyur nyid du bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-11: stong smon mtshan med rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-12: zag med bsod nams tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-14: bhrum/ rang byung nyid zla padma rin chen rgyas la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-15: rdo rje mnyam nyid thugs su chud pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-16: mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun la rol pa mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-17: bde gshegs dbyings nyid de bzhin nyid gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-18: dus bzhi rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'ubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-19: thams cad 'od gsal dkyil 'khor thugs chud pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-20: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-21: spyod yul 'phrog med brjod kyis mi lang ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-22: dus bzhi mnyam nyid nges pa'i don nyid nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340a-23: thugs rje dbang gis 'gro drug dus gnas bzhugs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340b-0: @340b nga dang bdag med mnyam pa'i dbyings mkhyen pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340b-1: mnyam pa'i don grub rdo rje can gyis bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340b-2: rnam par rtog med byang chub rdo rje can gyi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340b-3: shes rab mchog gis ma lus yongs bsdus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340b-4: bde gshegs mi gnas mnyam nyid ngang du byon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340b-5: thabs chen ma 'dres rnam pa sbas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340b-6: dmigs med bde gshegs nyid dbyings thugs chud pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340b-7: thabs dang shes rab dbyings nyid dam pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340b-8: phyogs bcu dus bzhi dbyings gnas mthas gtugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340b-9: shes rab mchog ldan gsal ba'i ngang 'chang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340b-10: thugs rje byin rlabs sna tshogs 'phro ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340b-11: bde gshegs ma lus thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340b-12: yid bzhin rin chen mi zad par ldan 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340b-13: rang rig rgyal po che yis rtogs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340b-14: zhes nyid la nyid du brjod de rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340b-15: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340b-16: gzhal yas khang dbub pa thabs dra ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:340b-17: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-6: hr'i ha h'um ba da ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-7: dzri ku ru p'a na hr'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-8: h'um l'a syee sa ma ya stvam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-9: tram m'a lye sa ma ya ho: hr'i g'i ti r'a go nya ham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-10: aa nri tya r'a ga ya m'i mee dh'a ra ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-11: thlim ni sa ra ma b'a sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-12: h'um sva r'a dz'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-13: mum shr'am aa ram g'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-14: dza: dh'u pa pra bi sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-16: bam d'a ba su khi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-22: aom mah'a badzra dh'a ra ma h'a kro dhe shva ri dzva la ni phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-23: aom mah'a ratna dha ra mah'a kro dhe shva ri dzva la ni phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-24: aom mah'a padma dha ra mah'a kro dhe shva ri dzva la n'i phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-25: aom mah'a karma dha ra mah'a kro dhe shva ri dzva la ni phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-26: h'um h'um h'um badzra tsitta h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-27: aa aa aa badzra bha dra sa manta aa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-34: aom hye hi bha ga w'a na mah'a ka ru n'i ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-45: aom; ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-46: yon tan 'phrin las rmad po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341a-47: de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341b-0: phyag rgya chen por @341b bdag gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341b-1: aom badzra sa ma ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341b-2: aom badzra sa ma ya stvam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341b-3: aom badzra sa ma ya ho zhes brjod pas gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par grags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341b-4: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341b-5: gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341b-7: bya ba mo rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341b-8: de nas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid chen pos bdag nyid chen po ye shes dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341b-9: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341b-10: aom mah'a a'a darsha sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341b-11: aom mah'a pra tya pa kshe na sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341b-12: aom mah'a sa ma t'a sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341b-13: aom ma h'a kri tya aa nushtha na sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341b-14: aom sarba ta th'a ga mah'a k'a ya badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341b-15: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a mah'a w'a ka badzra sva bha ba aatma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341b-16: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a mah'a tsitta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:341b-17: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mah'a aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-0: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mah'a p'u @342a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-1: dza badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham zhes brjod pas thim par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-4: ae ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-5: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-6: sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-7: sna tshogs sgra rnams gsal bar 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-8: gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-9: bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-10: sgra dang ming tshig so sor grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-11: thams cad gsung gi phyag rgyas chog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-12: rgyud mchog rgyud chen dra ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-13: bde ldan gsung gi don 'byung ba'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-14: thams cad padma'i ngang gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-15: grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-16: ji ltar brjod kyang gsung mchog ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-17: theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-18: log 'gro ma lus thams cad skad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-19: byang chub rdo rje gsung du bsdus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-20: bsdus nyid phyogs bcur rnam par grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-21: sgra nyid ma chags ngang du gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-22: gsungs pa nyid na brjod du med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-23: brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-24: kun la grags shing so sor mjal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-25: dper na de bzhin sbrid sangs bzhin; ;gsung gcig sgra yis thams cad go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-26: 'di ni gsung mchog rgyal po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342a-27: theg pa mthon dman bsam yas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-0: de bzhin nyid las ma @342b gsungs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-1: gdul ba'i thabs su so sor thos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-2: ji ltar gsung rab kun brjod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-3: de bzhin nyid kyis gsungs pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-4: yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-5: ljags kyi rtse mor ma byung yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-6: thugs rje gsung gi byin rlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-7: 'gro don sna tshogs so sor gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-8: gsal nyid gsung gi rdo rje mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-9: de bzhin gsung gis 'gro don rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-10: de bzhin ngang las ma g-yos kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-11: dper na brag cha'i sgra bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-12: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-14: gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas nyid kyi phyag rgya ston pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-19: aom tsa kra manda la h'um aam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-20: l'am badzra gandha bha sha l'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-21: sv'a ratna pra bh'a na svam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-22: aom badzra gandha bh'a sha a'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-23: aom padma pra bh'a na a'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-24: pam badzra gandha pra bh'a na p'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-25: h'am badzra ga takshni pra bh'a na ham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-26: tam badzra gandha bh'a sha pra bh'a na tam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-27: sh'i ranta pra bh'a na sh'i h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-28: badzra gandha pra bh'a na gho sha h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-29: tram khadga pra bh'a na t'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-30: tr'am badzra gandha bh'a sha pra bh'a na tri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-31: hr'i: padma pra bh'a na hr'i:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-32: badzra gandha bh'a sha pra bh'a na hr'i:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:342b-33: ha badzra gandha bh'a sha pra bh'a na ham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-0: aa badzra gandha bh'a sha pra bh'a na a'a: me k'a la @343a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-2: h'um badzra gandha pra bh'a na bh'a sha h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-3: th'am pra bh'a na manda la th'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-4: sv'am badzra gandha bha sha ham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-6: h'um ratna svam s'a dha bha dra pra bh'a na svam hri:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-7: badzra gandha bha sha pra bh'a na hr'i:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-8: mu autpa la n'i la pra bh'a na mu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-9: a'a badzra gandha bha sha pra bh'a na a'a:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-10: phat badzra aa ma: muta gha ra pra bh'a na phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-11: aom badzra gandha bha sha pra bh'a na aom aom//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-12: phat mah'a badzra pra bh'a na phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-13: h'um mah'a ratna badzra gandha bh'a sha pra bh'a na h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-14: phat hr'i: padma mata gha ra pra bh'a na hr'i:hr'i:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-15: aom mah'a badzra padma badzra gandha bha sha bh'a na hr'i:hr'i:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-16: aa karma muta gha ra badzra pra bh'a na phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-17: aa karma badzra gandha bh'a sha bra bh'a na h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-18: aa aa aa zhes brjod pas phyag rgya gsung gi dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-20: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-21: don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems las phyag rgya gsung gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-22: de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa las chos thams cad nam mkha' dang yum gyi dbyings su 'dus par bstan nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343a-23: yang dag don gyi gsang mchog ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-0: bde ba thugs @343b kyi dkyil 'khor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-1: nges pa'i don tshan bcu bzhi gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-2: yid bzhin rin chen gsal bar thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-3: thams cad ma lus thig le'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-4: sku lnga'i 'od zer mang po kun; ;thams cad yum 'gyur dbyings su thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-6: byang chub sems kyi thig le ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-7: kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-8: kha dog gnas dang dbyibs ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-9: yon tan mchog gi snying po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-10: rtog gi spyod yul yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-11: zab cing rgya chen rab sbyangs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-12: gsal ldan brtan pa'i spyod yul te; ;gzhan nas btsal zhing brtag tu med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-13: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-14: sna tshogs 'jig rten brtan g-yo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-15: rgyal ba mngon byung thams cad kun; ;nam mkha'i dbyings su ma gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-16: dus bzhi phyogs bcu gdan med de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-17: dus gsum bde gshegs nyid kyi mnga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-18: sngon gyi bde gshegs thugs chud pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-19: nam mkha'i dbyings su thams cad thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-20: thams cad shes rab dbyings nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-21: dbyings la dbyings ni rnam par sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-22: shes rab dbyings nyid 'byor pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-23: byang chub rdo rje thig le yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-24: dkyil 'khor gzhal yas lhun grub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-25: rgya dang bral ba'i bsam yas kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:343b-26: kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-2: ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-3: de yis ma zin gang yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-4: rang gi rnam rtog ma yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-5: yang dag gshegs dang log rtog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-6: gzhan yang sprul pa mang po'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-7: phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-8: de la gsad cing gzung du med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-9: kha dog dbyibs dang gnas ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-10: skyes bu dam pa mchog 'dod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-11: de la rtag 'grus gsal bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-12: de yi 'bras bu mthar phyin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-13: rgyu 'bras med pa'i dus gcig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-14: thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-15: yi ge 'bru gsum rdzogs par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-16: mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor los bsdus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-17: tshogs chen gnyis kyang rtogs par rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-18: skye 'jig med pa'i dbyings la zhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-20: mtha' yas 'jig rten bsam yas kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-21: rgyal ba yum gyi dbyings su thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-22: thams cad ma lus chos skur 'du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-24: chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344a-25: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las; ;thams cad yum gyi dbyings su 'dus pa shin tu gsang ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams @344b cad kyis yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-1: sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pas; ;thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-2: gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-3: snying po phyag rgya 'da' bar dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-4: mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-5: rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-6: lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-7: sbyar ba phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-8: aom dang mum gnyis rtse sbyar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-9: 'bru brgyad bsnol nas rtser sprad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-10: rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-11: bde ba chen po'i sbyin pa'i rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-12: 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-13: h'um bsgreng rtse mor rdo rjer 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-14: zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-15: 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-16: 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-17: mam gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-19: btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-20: 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:344b-24: 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345a-2: 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar dkan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345a-3: svam rtser 'bar ba rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345a-4: zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345a-21: 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan; ;'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345a-22: tam bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345a-24: btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345a-25: autpal la sogs klu shing mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345a-26: rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345a-28: chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345a-29: gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-0: pi wang gar mkhan mchog nyid @345b de; ;me tog phreng ba sbos mchod ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-1: mar me byug la sogs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-2: las la 'khril cing chos la brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-3: dbu rnams byon nas 'dud pa'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-4: gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-5: gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-6: sgo bzhi phyag rgya chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-7: nri mgo gdengs dang rdo rjes gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-8: thod phreng chen pos gnon pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-9: rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-10: lcags kyu zhags pa spho ta ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-11: sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-13: thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-14: mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-15: sreg par dang ni pi wang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-16: go cha po te rin chen sgrom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-17: me dang chu ru rab tu bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-18: yum ni gnyis med chos kyi dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-19: kun bzang mnyam gzhag ye shes 'phro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-20: yum gyur mnyam rdzogs padmo'i dkyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-21: gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-22: yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-23: yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:345b-24: phyag rgya chen po tshogs mchog ni //
