K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:348b-43: mum/ lus ngag yid gsum dril bu las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-0: @349a *// sku gsung thugs nyid gtum por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-1: bskor thabs che ba'i mchog tshul du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-2: rdo rje lan gsum gsor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-3: lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-5: rnal 'byor pho mo gang snang ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-6: thams cad gcig tu 'dus par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-7: yul la mngon du snang bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-8: mi bskyod rdo rje thabs ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-9: aom dang ham ni ma thal bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-10: lan gsum gsor chen gur dkar bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-12: aom dang ham ni thal tsam du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-13: kun tu gru bzhir bdag gnas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-14: lan gsum gsor la gang btsan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-17: de nas zla gam mdog dmar sham //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-18: 'brel ba mnyam par lan gsum gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-19: khros pas gsor la gang brtson pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-20: yid la dmigs dang las thams cad; ;dbang chen dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-21: de las gtum pa'i mdog gnas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-22: drag tu phat ces brjod pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-23: kha dog nag por bdag gnas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-24: bskal pa 'bar ba'i dbus gnas pa; ;khros te dgug pa nyid dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-25: rgyang ni ring du 'phangs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-27: aom bdzra da ha dzva la ha na badzra pa tsa dzva la badzra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-28: chos la brtan pa phyag bsnams pa; ;sbubs ni dril bu chos khams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-29: shes rab yum gyi tshogs su brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-30: skad ni gsung snyan bde ba mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-31: lce ni gar mkhan mya ngan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349a-32: chos sku thugs kyi thugs nyid las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-0: rab tu @349b gsor la gang brtson pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-1: mum la sogs pa'i yi ge bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-3: mum gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-4: kun tu dbang sgyur yid 'ong ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-6: aom badzra ghanda p'a sha dharma dha ra h'um h'um h'um zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la dgyes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-7: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-8: sgyu 'phrul chen po thabs dang shes rab tu 'byung ba phyag mtshan gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-9: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-10: shin tu phra ba'i dam tshig mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-11: phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-12: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-13: sor ni bzhi yi tshad du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-14: 'bru lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-15: snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-16: bdud rtsi lnga yis rab bsnyams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-17: rig pas thig ni gdab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-18: lte ba rtsibs dang ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-19: rtse bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-20: gru chad bzhi dang gru bzhi yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-21: bar khyams sgo khyud ldan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-22: sen zlum tsam gyi nyi zla la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-24: yungs 'bru tsam gyi yi ge las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-25: phyag rgya til 'bru tsam du bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-26: bcos bu'i ras ni sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-27: rgyan phreng dung dang bro bas bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-28: glu tshig bro gar rol mo yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-29: sprin phung tshogs kyis rab tu mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-30: yum dang 'jo ba sems ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:349b-31: ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bzhin mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-1: dang kha dog mtshan ldan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-2: zhal tu gyur pa'i me pos la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-3: bza' btung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-4: las bzhi mchod pa rab tu sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-5: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-6: shin tu phra ba sbyangs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-7: bsam yas dag la de bzhin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-8: rigs pas dpag pa tsam du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-9: mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-10: sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-11: phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-12: mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-13: sna tshogs rin po che yi gzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-14: mdzes par bris shing spras pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-16: dbyibs legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-17: rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-18: rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-19: glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-20: bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-21: do shal dpung rgyan se mo do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-22: bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-23: rang la mdzes pas brgyan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-24: lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-25: bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-26: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-27: dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-28: skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-29: rim gyis yang na gcig car du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-30: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-31: mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350a-32: gsal ldan ma 'am byin rlabs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-0: dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs @350b mched //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-1: mnyes nas grub pa'i dam tshig mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-2: bdag nyid chen po mchod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-3: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-4: srid gsum 'gro ba ma lus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-5: dga' ba chen pos khyab par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-6: sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-7: phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-8: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-9: khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon du gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-10: lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-11: gang na mi gnas mi dmigs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-12: rang bzhin mnyam pa'i chos nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-13: mig yor tshur du sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-14: nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-15: goms pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-16: kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-17: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-18: de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-19: rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-20: bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-21: rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-22: dbang phyug la sogs lngas mchod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-23: dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-24: nye ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-25: nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-26: dad brtson brtul zhugs rab rtogs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-27: phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-28: rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-29: snying rjes chud ma zos par gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-30: yang na thal mo rab bsnol nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-31: phyag rgya chen po'i 'phang du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-32: dkyil 'khor mdzub gang tshad du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-33: mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-34: yang nas gzhi mnyam pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-35: dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:350b-36: yang na lus grang [?] tshad du ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-0: @351a *// yang na lus ni gsum gyi tshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-1: phur bu srad bu tshon phye dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-2: gos rgyan mdzes ma yid 'ong grogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-3: thig gdab cho ga phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-4: mkhas ldan chen pos bsgrims te bya; ;yang na khru ni bcu drug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-5: nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lngar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-6: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-7: sku gsung thugs ldan gzugs kyang dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-8: yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad dam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-9: nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-10: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-11: ma mthong rmongs pa ston phyir tshon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-12: kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-13: lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-14: 'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du dgye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-15: ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-16: yi ge'am gdan nam snying po'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-17: phyag rgya'am sku gsung thugs ldan par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-18: byin rlabs ya mtshan rmad po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-20: sa la sogs pa phyag rgyar byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-21: rnam grol rim par thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-22: dag pa'i ye shes kyis byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-23: smos ci dgos te de nyid yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-24: phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-25: mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-26: dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-27: rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-28: 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-29: phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-30: sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-31: kun tu bzang mo mi bsnyengs yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351a-32: kun tu bzang mor de gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-0: ye @351b shes dril bu gsil zhing spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-1: ae ma ho sangs rgyas yum chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-2: nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-3: cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-4: cis kyang ma g-yos ma 'dres pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-5: bde chen yum du gyur bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-6: kun kyang phyag rgya yum lngas btab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-8: mum/ kun tu bzang mo'i thugs nyid las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-9: rdo rje yum chen thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-10: rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-11: mi phyed dril bu 'chang zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-13: mum/ ji ltar rgyal po'i gnas bshams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-14: rgyal pos gtsigs chen 'gyed pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-15: bde chen yum du gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-16: dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-17: thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-18: 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-19: rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-20: bdag nyid yum chen mtshan ma'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-21: phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-22: nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-24: mum/ dril bu dril bu grags snyan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-25: yum nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-26: 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal mo yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-27: phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-28: dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-30: thams cad dril bu nyid pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-31: nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-32: de las chos sku gsung 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-33: mum gha dza l'an l'a rka mum zhes brjod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-34: phyag rgya'i tshogs su snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-35: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:351b-36: mtshon cha dam tshig phyag rgya glu'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-1: kun tu bzang pos thabs dang shes rab 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-2: de nas yid dang chos mthun par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-3: thugs kyi phyag rgya rdo rje 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-4: shes rab dril bu chos la brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-5: h'um dang mum gi snying po 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-6: de las rdo rje rtse bcur 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-7: aom dang mum gi mchog tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-8: shes rab nyi zer zla rgyas thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-9: 'bar ba'i phung pos chos la brten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-10: de las gzung thabs gnyis kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-11: 'bru lnga phyag rgya nyid du ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-12: de las rdo rje phyag bsnams gsor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-13: de las 'khor lo phyag bsnams gsor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-14: de las nor bu phyag bsnams pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-16: de las ral gri phyag bsnams gcod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-17: de nyid rdo rje phyag bsnams pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-18: thabs chen drug tu yang dag gsor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-19: de las rdo rje gzung thabs gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-20: aom dang mum gyi mtshon bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-21: rdo rje rtse bcu thabs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-22: thugs kar bstan pa'i tshul du 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-23: sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-25: mum las phyag rgya chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-26: dril gsil 'bar bas sangs rgyas yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-27: mchod gnas chos la brtan par 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-28: thams cad kun tu phyag rgya yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-29: thabs dang shes rab rdo rje 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-30: sku gsung thugs ni thams cad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-31: yon tan 'phrin las kun tu rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-32: sgyu 'phrul dra bas byang chub pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-33: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang du dmigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-34: de las rdo rje mchog bsnams pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352a-35: de las mi bskyod nyi ma'i lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-1: aom h'um svam gyi rtser 'dzin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-2: nyid yas yang dag bskyed tshul du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-3: shes rab yum du shin du brtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-4: rdo rje 'bar bas rab brtan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-5: thabs chen yid ni sangs rgyas yab /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-6: gcig dang du ma yongs kyis med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-8: yid dang chos su rab brtags pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-9: rdo rje 'chang rgyal tshul chen las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-10: rdo rje drag por lan gsum gsor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-11: gtum pa'i sngags brjod de bskyed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-12: bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-13: nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-14: dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-15: rin chen dbyig dang 'byung ba kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-16: de dag rdzas kyang ma yin te; ;rang sems bsod nams brten pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-17: ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-18: gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-19: thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-20: de lta bu yi ngang du 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-21: shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-22: thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-23: ye shes la ni ye shes rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-24: ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-25: rgyal ba mngon byung skyob pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-26: byin rlabs ston pa'ang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-27: bya byed nus mthu'i gzi byin gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-28: sgyu ma rdo rje btsan po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-29: cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-30: yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-31: sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-32: ma nyams 'jug pa rab brtson pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-33: zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-34: bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-35: dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-36: de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-37: sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:352b-38: ye shes thig le de nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-0: @353a *// ye shes thig le nyid snang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-1: bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-2: phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-3: zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-4: rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-5: 'khor lo rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-6: dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-7: mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-8: rgya chen gsung las don byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-9: mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-10: gcig dang du mar bral ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-11: mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-12: sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi gzigs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-13: rang byung ye shes gnas med snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-14: log par rtog brtags rnam dag cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-15: ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-16: thugs rje chen pos 'brel bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-17: 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-18: bde ba chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-19: stangs dpyal gnyis sam yang na lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-20: byas te dad ldan rab zhugs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-22: skal pa mnyam pa'i ye shes de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-23: gnyer na nye bar mnyam pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-24: ya mtshan chen po 'byung bar nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-25: dad med nyams na phung bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-27: rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-28: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po rgyu 'phrul dra ba las lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyis dngos grub blang pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353a-29: ye nas mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-0: thabs dang @353b shes rab ldan byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-1: rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-3: de bzhin nyid kyi gzhal yas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-4: rig pa rang byung gyur pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-5: mnyam par mnyam la mi gnas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-6: chos sku'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-7: 'jig rten brtan g-yo thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-8: rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnas mod kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-9: gzung 'dzin rnam rtog zhags pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-10: rang rig bsgribs shing bdag tu bcings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-11: kun gyis yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-12: de bzhin chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-13: rtog dang mi rtog rang rig dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-14: yang dag thabs chen rdzogs pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-15: rin chen sna tshogs la sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-16: 'byung ba bzhi las gyur rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-17: thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-18: gzugs sogs ri mor bris pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-19: ye shes chen po rab 'byams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-20: don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-22: thams cad dbyings su bsdus nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-23: nyid kyi thugs la bstims byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-24: thams cad chos sku'i phyag rgya che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-25: dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dag byas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-26: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-28: thams cad chos sku phyag rgya che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-29: yang dag rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-30: ting 'dzin don rnams gsal bsgoms te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-31: m'a ma k'i yi rgyun chags la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-32: yang dag chos sku [?] phyag rgya che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-33: de bzhin ting 'dzin gsal bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:353b-34: don mchog ma lus rdzogs pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-2: dri med chos sku phyag rgya gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-3: dbyings dang de bzhin nyid med par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-4: ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-5: kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs su bsgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-6: sna tshogs 'phrin las rnam par rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-7: don gyi snying po mchog rnams kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-8: byang chub phyogs rnams rab tu rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-9: 'jig rten gtso mchog rnams kyis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-11: chos sku phyag rgya de dag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-12: las lnga'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-13: ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-14: ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-15: drag po gtum po gdul ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-16: bdag nyid drag po bsgoms nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-18: bgegs kyi ling ga gnan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-19: gtum po rngam pa'ang brlag par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-20: mi mthun phyogs kyang rdul du rlog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-22: shin tu stobs drag che ldan 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-23: thams cad gnyis med dbyings bsdu'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-24: bdag nyid ha ya gr'i bar bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-25: dmar po'i chos sku gsal bsgoms te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-26: mi mthun phyogs rnams gdan du gding //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-27: ting 'dzin gsal bas byin brlabs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-28: thams cad ma lus dbang du bsdu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-29: mthu chen dag kyang phyi bzhin 'brang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-31: thams cad yon tan 'phel bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-32: bdag nyid rgyal ba'i khyu mchog ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-33: gser gyi mdog 'dra phyag rgyar bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354a-34: gang 'phel chos sku gdan du gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-0: de ltar @354b dag pas byin brlabs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-1: yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-2: tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-3: ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-4: thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-5: gtum khro ma lus zhi bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-6: dkar zhing 'tsher ba'i chos sku bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-7: gang zhig gtum khro zhi ba'i gdan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-8: de bzhin ting 'dzin byin brlabs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-9: gtum po rngam po'ang zhi bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-10: gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-11: zhi zhing dul ba nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-12: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-13: rnam bzhi dkyil 'khor dbyings su bsdus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-14: bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-16: aa ho:/chos sku phyag rgya chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-17: dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin par nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-18: nye ba'i lha ni gang bsgrub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-19: phyag rgya'i snying po bris bcug na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-20: gang bsgoms the tshom med par 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-21: de ni rgyal ba kun dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-23: 'jig rten pa yi lha bsgrubs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-24: lha yi snying po gang yang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-25: bris te dkyil 'khor nang bcug na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-27: chos nyid rten cing 'brel bris na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-28: chos kyi don rnams rtogs 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-29: rang dang spyi yi don rtogs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-30: skye rga na 'chi med par rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-31: phyag rgya chen po de dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-32: nyon mongs las rnams spyod byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-33: snying po mnor don bris na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-34: ngan song sdug bsngal med par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-35: gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:354b-36: dpag tshad med pa'i phyag rgya che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-0: @355a *// sku gsung thugs ni rgyun mi chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-1: zhing khams bye brdul dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-2: aa ho:/rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-4: lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis dngos grub len pa'i thabs te mchod rten gdab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po rgyal po dbang sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-6: shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-7: bde ba'i 'bru tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-8: rdo rje lam las padmor bskyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-9: rtse nas bstim shing dkyil 'khor sgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-10: nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su; ;gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-11: trang gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-12: rin chen dkyil 'khor gsal spro bstim /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-14: tram/ gsang ba'i gsang chen gsang mchog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-15: gsang ba kun la mnyan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-16: gsang ba'i don nyid rtogs pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-17: gzhan du smra bar bya ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-18: gsal ba'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-19: gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-20: yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-21: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-23: aom// dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen pe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-24: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-25: rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-26: rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-27: lag pa'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-28: gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-29: h'um gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355a-30: las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355b-0: aom// khyod ni rdo rje @355b las yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355b-1: las rnams ma lus kun byos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355b-3: khyod kyi dgos pa byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355b-4: smra byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355b-5: gsang ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:355b-6: hr'i:yi phyag rgya tshogs mchog las //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:358b-30: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:358b-31: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes @359a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-1: pa chen po rol mo'i sprin rnam par spros te rgyan bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-2: sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-6: glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-7: chos kyis dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-8: rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-10: bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgyas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-11: yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsir 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-12: a'a li k'a li'i phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-13: sku gsung mchog gi thugs ldan pas; ;thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-15: 'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-16: nus mthu can du gang gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-17: rig 'dzin rgyal po'i zhing du grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-18: mi dang lha dang tshangs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-19: skye ba rnam dag 'dzin mod kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-20: khyad par sa la gnas gyur yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-21: pha rol phyin ba kun tu rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-22: thabs dang shes rab mchog gyur pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-23: sa yi khyad par bcu dang gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-24: rgyu 'bras khyad par lhun gyis rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-25: mkha' dbyings dang ba'i dbyings nyi zla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-26: ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-27: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-28: ma lus bar ni bsgoms par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-29: dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359a-30: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359b-0: sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs @359b rgyas te; ;sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359b-1: dkyil 'khor kun tu rab sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359b-3: cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359b-4: skyon nyid dag ste nyes pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359b-5: ces ched du brjod pas rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359b-6: rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur ste sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359b-7: aa ho: ma mthong rmongs la chags pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359b-8: chos rnams ming du brtags pa tsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359b-9: 'gro drug dus gnas ming tshogs khyad par rab snang ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359b-10: zab chen spyod yul log par rtog brtags ming tsam du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359b-11: a'a li k'a li la sogs 'dod pa'i snying po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359b-12: phyag rgya glu tshig sku gsung thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359b-13: thugs kyi thugs chen yon tan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359b-14: nyid de mnyam pa'i thugs su rab tu gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359b-15: mnyam nyid khyab pa'i stangs dpyal yon tan mchog ste sngags kyi 'phrin las rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359b-16: rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359b-17: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:359b-18: tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas dgyes pa chen pos chos thams cad ye nas rdzogs pa chen por lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig shin tu gsang ba'i snying po'i sprin bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa @360a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-2: ma rtogs pa dang log par rtog //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-3: phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-4: 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-5: rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-6: yi ge sgra btags ming tshogs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-7: brten pa'i tshog gis rab mchod te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-9: ston pa rdo rje thugs la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-14: gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-15: sku gsung thugs rig kun mnga' ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-16: bder gshegs kun gyi snying po rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-17: 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-18: chen po shes rab de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-19: byang chub sems ni rdo rje tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-20: dbang po yul dus rig pa'i rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-21: kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-22: bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-23: thugs kyi ye shes lngas blta zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-24: snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-25: bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-26: ye shes dgyes la mnyes par 'bul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-27: zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-28: ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-29: rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-30: gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-31: de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360a-32: phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-0: sku gsung yon tan 'phrin @360b las thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-1: ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-2: dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-4: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-5: rgyun du dkyil 'khor ma lus thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-6: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-9: sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba yis; ;bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-10: ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-11: thos bsam sgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-12: rab byung kun nam lhun gyis grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-13: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-14: 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-15: gang zhig 'di la mos gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-16: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-17: phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-18: dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-19: nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-20: bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-21: shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-22: dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-24: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-25: 'das dang da ltar byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-26: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-27: brnyes pas sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-28: 'byung dang ma thongs thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-30: 'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-31: 'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:360b-32: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-2: btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-3: kun gyi phyag rgya chen po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-4: thos bsam sgom la rab sbyangs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-5: shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-6: snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-7: lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-8: gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-9: rmongs la 'phyar bas gal te sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-10: dus min par ni srog zad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-11: bsregs dang sbrebs par yun ring gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-12: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-17: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-18: shin tu gsang ba man ngag gi snying po'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos dgyes pa chen po'i ngang las gsang ba 'byung ba bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-20: ae ma'o; ;thams cad ma lus dus gsum bder gshegs mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-21: gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-22: rang bzhin dbyer med gdod mtha' mi 'byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-23: ye nas mnyam pas rgyal ba rgya mtsho yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-24: 'gro 'ong med par dus gsum gcig car rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361a-25: dbye bsal med cing bzang ngan blang dor med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-0: rnam rtog nyid na ye shes rang bzhin @361b te; ;rnam rtog mi skyed ye shes brjod du med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-1: bdag tu med pa'i skyes mchog sngon sbyangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-3: snga rabs phyis 'byung dag dang dbyer med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-4: mngon sum sangs rgyas skyes mchog de dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-5: bskal pa 'ga' nas shes rab blo sbyangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-6: dad ldan 'ga' yis 'tsham par ci thig gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-7: bdag nyid ma mthong shes rgyud ma 'byongs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-8: gzhan du tshol zhing rmongs pa'i sems can gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-9: bstan kyang ma thos mtshon kyang ma mthong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-10: bdag cag gzhan du tshol bas sangs mi rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-11: de dang ma bral ston pa mi mthong zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-12: bgrod par 'dod pas phyin par mi nus te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-13: shes rgyud ci yin gang gis ngo shes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-14: bya byed las 'phags gyin 'da' 'dug byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-15: gang zhig blo la dpyod pa byang chub thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-16: ma spangs mtshan ma kun bral yong med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-17: dran byed mi spong 'khor rgyun mi 'byed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-18: ma snyigs mi 'byed mngon sum sangs rgyas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-19: blo yi rig pas dpyod cing nan tan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-20: mchong cing brten pas byang chub thob mngon te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-21: nam mkha' bzung bas sprin gyis khebs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-22: nam mkha' med par gang gis shes pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-23: sprin zhig 'byung zhing khebs par mi srid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-24: rnam par rtog pa'i g-yung drung sangs rgyas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-25: thams cad ye nas mnyam gnas rnam dag cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:361b-26: mi rtag sa ler gnas la rtog pa mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-2: bdag med bdag chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gter //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-3: ma bkag pa las rgyu zhing 'byung med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-4: thams cad sems kyi ngang ste sems zhes gdags su med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-5: ma bcos lhun gnas ye nas byang chub cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-6: thob rgyu med pas ye nas bder gshegs yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-7: zhes brjod pas chos dang ye shes kyi khams thams cad rang bzhin sangs rgyas bar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-8: mkhyen nas ji bzhin pa'i bdag nyid chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-9: ae ma'o ma bsgrubs grub chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-10: grub pa chen po ye shes che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-11: blang dor med pa'i sa chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-13: rtog pa'i ye shes yid bzhin gter //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-14: thams cad la yang me long bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-15: bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-16: gang na gsang chen 'di yod par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-17: me ma mur gyi dong 'bogs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-18: sbu gri so ni gtams pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-20: khong na gnas pa'i yang khong du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-21: lcags kyi sgrom bu kha bsdam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-22: dbyings nyid la ni nyid spyod phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-23: dbyings nyid mchog gi gnas la spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-24: de nyid mi gnas mya ngan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-25: rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-26: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362a-27: gsang ba chen po man ngag gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-0: @362b de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs nas nyid kyi sku la thams cad ma lus par ston te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-3: snga phyi med par mnyam yin par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-4: nges pa med par yang dag gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-6: rang dang spyi ru bstan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-7: ji snyed brtan g-yo la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-8: sgyu ma mig yor tshul yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-9: skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-10: de la rtag tu mnyam sbyor zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-11: sems can kun gyi zhing gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-12: de dag gnyis med dbyings su sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-13: thams cad thabs kyi mtshan nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-14: thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-15: thabs dang thabs las byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-16: de ni byang chub rdo rje mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-17: ji snyed brjod pa'i kha rgyud kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-18: yang dag don gyi snying po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-19: gang nas btsal kyang mi rnyed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-20: rang rig sgrib med dag pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-21: de la rtag 'grus goms pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-22: bsnyen pa'i dam pa de yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-23: de ni ma nor lam yin par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-24: aa yis bo dhi rab tu bsdus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-25: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-26: gcig gam 'di zhes brjod du med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-28: byin rlabs bsam yas mtha' yas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-29: don bsdus gsung rab bzhi bcu gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-30: de las lhag pa'i don smra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-31: de ni rnam dag lam min te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-32: rang blos bsam pa'i 'khrul pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:362b-33: thams cad rang rig byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363a-2: tshad bzhis phab pa'i don yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363a-3: dag pa rnam gsum tshul bsgom zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363a-4: 'bru lngar bsdus pa thabs che te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363a-5: 'gro ba kun la rang rig gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363a-6: bya ba med la byas pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363a-7: zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin gter //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363a-8: bum pa bzang dang yid bzhin mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363a-9: za ma tog dang yid bzhin rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363a-10: gzhan nas yong 'ong ma yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363a-11: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363a-12: bsnyen pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363a-13: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363a-15: bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pas brtags pa la mngon par zhen pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363a-16: yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba dag gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'tshal nas rgyu dang 'bras bur rmongs pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363a-17: srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i rab tu cha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363a-18: de rab tu tsha ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363a-19: 'dod pas gdungs nas 'di bas shin tu grang mang ci ma rung snyam pa'i mod la rab tu sbrebs pa padma ltar gas pa'i sdug bsngal drag po dag gis rab tu nyen pa de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363b-0: shin tu grang ba la sogs pa brgyad po dag tu 'jig @363b rten gyi khams brgyud cing bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis su myong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363b-1: de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa dang yi dvags ltog pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363b-2: 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams yid du mi 'ong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363b-3: gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogs su 'gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363b-4: yong med par yang 'gyur zhing shin tu rid cing bskams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363b-5: lus dang yan lag dang dbang po mi 'tsham par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363b-6: bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363b-7: de nas las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo'i rnam par smin pa de khad kyis bslabs pa dang sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas yi dvags srin po chen po rab tu gdug pa gtum po lus gcig la mgo rgya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363b-9: lus brgya mgo gcig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363b-13: gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs pa thogs pa 'khor rab tu mang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363b-15: 'jigs pa'i nga ro sna tshogs sgrog pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363b-18: dri dang; kha rlangs kyis thams cad skyi bung zhes byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363b-19: rab tu 'jigs pa'i rlung grang ba dang tsha ba'i dbugs kyis phyogs kun tu khams 'khrug par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363b-20: nad bzhi rgya rtsa bzhis 'debs pa byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363b-21: myos shing nyams par byed pa'i mthus klu'i ris dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:363b-22: lha ma yin gyi ris dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364a-2: de sngon gyi rten pa'i stobs dang thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs nas thugs rjes 'dus par gyur te thams cad kyis mtshan nyid bstan pa'i glu 'di blangs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364a-4: 'gro ba yongs ni bde gshegs lam yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364a-5: sdug bsngal sreg mdzad sgyu ma'i sprul par snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364a-6: yon tan rmad byung che ba'i rang bzhin 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364a-7: sdug bsngal kun la bshes gnyen mgon po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364a-8: rmongs dang 'khrul pa rab sel zhe sdang 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364a-9: kun 'byung bde ba rdo rje sku mchog ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364a-10: rdzogs ldan mdzad pa'i 'phrin las bsam yas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364a-11: thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis bdud rnams 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364a-12: sku mdog sna tshogs thabs mkhas bsam yas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364a-13: rol pa'i rtsed mor 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364a-14: byang chub sems kyis lam la gnas par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364a-15: 'gro ba kun las bde ba gcig pu [?] pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364a-17: dgyes pa'i mnyes pa nyid la gnas par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364a-18: byin rlabs kun gyis bde ba nyid la snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364a-19: zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la kun nas rnam par rgyal ba nyid du mkhyen nas mnyes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364b-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'dul ba'i nga rgyal chen po gzi brjid ston pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa @364b chen po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin chen po rnam par 'phro ba'i rgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364b-1: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas khro mo'i dbang phyug chen mo mngon du phyung ste hi hi zhes dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis padma rgyas par mdzad nas gnyis su med par 'khyil pa'i dgyes pas thim nas byang chub sems kyi sprin las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364b-2: h'um h'um h'um bi shva badzra kro dha dzva la na [?] manda la phat phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364b-3: ha la ha la ha h'um zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa thams cad khyab par khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs stong gsum gyi 'jig rten tsam phyogs bcu'i rdul phra mo snyed thon par gyur pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364b-4: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad g-yos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364b-12: kun tu rab tu chem chem mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364b-19: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i stong khams thams cad na gnas pa'i dbang che ba dang mthu che ba'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad brgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:364b-20: rab tu brgyal pa [?] gyur [?] ro [?]//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po nyid 'jigs byed chen po shin tu rngam pa'i skyi bung zhes byed pa'i 'bar ba chen po khrag 'thung sku smug nag cir yang 'gyur ba dbu @365a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365a-1: dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa de dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur te dur khrod chen por dgyes nas khrag khrig gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor keng rus chen por ri rab kyi steng gi 'bar ba chen po'i klong gi 'khro lo'i dkyil na dbang phyug chen po dang dur khrod kyi bdag po dregs pa chen po khyo shug gi gdan la brkyang bskum du bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365a-2: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin phung de dag kyang la la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365a-3: dpal khrag 'thung chen por gyur te shar phyogs su bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365a-5: dpal khrag 'thung chen po rin po cher gyur te lho phyogs su bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365a-7: dpal khrag 'thung chen po padmar gyur te nub phyogs su bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365a-9: dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun tu las su gyur te byang phyogs su bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365a-10: de dag kun kyang 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365a-11: rngam pa'i nga ro dang 'bar ba'i klong na dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhis dri za dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365a-13: gshin rje la sogs pa khyod shug gis gdan du byas pa la bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365a-14: btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo rnams kyang so so'i sku la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365b-0: rigs lnga'i he ru ka las gcig tu bstims te bsdus nas gcig gis mang po 'dul ba'i ngo mtshar bstan nas dregs pa chen po la sogs pa gtum pa'i sems kyis gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan @365b nas mgrin gcig tu 'dug pa'i nga ros brlang po'i gtum tshig tu smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365b-1: thong thong snying rje'i bdag po ci de ltar byed dam zhes 'dzer zhing shin tu gtum sems kyis rngam nas khros so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos thams cad kyi bdag nyid des dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad zhabs brgyad du gnas nas rngam pa'i skad kyis thugs rjes 'dul ba'i thabs kyis shin tu khros nas h'um h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365b-4: kh'a hi kh'a hi zhes brjod nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa dgug pa chen po 'i tshogs de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365b-6: yan lag kun bcad gtubs nas khrag kun 'thungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365b-8: de nas h'um h'um h'um ae aa ra li dza:dza:zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' dang bcas par nyungs 'bru gcig tsam du chud par bsdus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365b-9: de nas 'byung po ma lus pa'i rgyal po 'ang rgyal po dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365b-10: 'byung po thams cad kyi chung ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365b-11: 'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo srin mo chen mo mo'i srin mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365b-22: za ba mo dag [?] dga' ba mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:365b-23: ra ro khrag 'thung myos byed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366a-3: ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366a-4: bum rna sngo nag chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366a-5: gsus 'dzin ser nag chen mo la sogs pa bran dang yang bran g-yog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366a-6: yang g-yog 'khor zhing gi rdul snyed kyang bsdus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i 'dul ba'i thabs kyis yang rigs lnga'i 'jigs byed snang bar byas nas de dag kun dgyes pa rol pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366a-8: aom h'um aam badzra pra be sha aa la la ho:zhes brjod pas 'byung po'i rgyal mo rnams shin tu chags pa'i yid g-yos nas padma'i dkyil 'khor sdud cing rgyas par gyur nas dper na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366a-9: khab len la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung rdo rje'i sku la srin mo mi srun mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366a-16: ser nag chen mo rnams 'khril to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366a-17: bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i sku la tshangs ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366a-22: bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung rin po che'i sku la bdud rtsi mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366b-1: bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung padmo chen po'i sku la khrag gis myos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366b-6: bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i kun tu las kyi sku la me mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de dag gis h'um h'um zhes brjod pas padmo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs bsdus nas shin tu bcum par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366b-12: de nas dgyes te zhes brjod pas byang chub sems kyi sprin las dkar mo'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366b-18: sme sha can gyi tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366b-19: ma mo'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar dang chas nas thon to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366b-20: thon nas kyang 'bar pa chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs nas 'khor par 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang rang gi lag chas chas nas 'khod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366b-21: de nas shin tu dgyes nas he zhes brjod pas seng gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366b-22: stag gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366b-23: wa gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366b-24: khyi gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366b-25: bzhad gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366b-26: kangka gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:366b-27: dur bya gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367a-1: chen mo'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas thon par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367a-2: thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor ba'i mtshan shar phyogs kyi phyi rol nas 'khor ba'i rngam pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367a-3: de nas shin tu dgyes pas phyogs bcu'i zhing du ma lus par khyab nas phat ces brjod pas rdo rje sring 'gro ma'i tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367a-4: rdo rje gdong mo'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367a-5: rdo rje 'jig rten ma'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367a-6: rdo rje ro langs ma'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas thon par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367a-7: thon nas kyang 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi skor shin tu gtum pa'i gzugs kyis gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367a-8: de nas dgyes pa chen po'i sprin las phyogs bcu nas phat ces bsgrags pas thams cad khros nas ma mo thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas gsal bar yud tsam gyis bgye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun thugs rje chen po'i bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367a-10: aom badzra mah'a aa mri ta mah'a kro dhe aam aam aam zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po de dag gi sna nas thon to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-0: mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi rgya mtshor btsud pa las gnas nas au tstshusma @367b kro dhas phyung bas 'dam kun 'thungs te dran pa slar rnyed nas khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyang dbu dgu brgya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-3: sku 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil na bzhugs par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-4: de'i dus su 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa kun tu dregs pa'i dbang phyug thams cad 'dul ba thabs sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab par so sor snang bas dus gcig tu btul to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-5: de nas de dag shin tu 'bar zhing bred pas rab tu zhum pa'i nga ros 'bangs su mchi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-7: 'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-8: mgo dang lus ni brgyar 'gas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-9: snying yang 'gas shing gtubs gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-10: rul myags tshig nas brlag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-11: dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-12: ces 'bangs su mchi bar mna' bor nas dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-13: thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu yang smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-14: bdag cag rnams kyis mchis brang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-15: ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-16: dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-17: dpa' bo lha rje bzhes su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-18: bdag cag so so'i 'khor bcas kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-20: ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-21: gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-22: g-yo sgyu med cing gus ldan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-23: sems kyis blangs nas spyi bo yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-24: gtsug tu bzhag ste bkur bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-25: de yi dgos pa ci yang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-26: ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:367b-27: gal te dpa' bo'i spyan snga 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:368a-2: bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:368a-3: gas btubs dum bur rul bar mchi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:368a-5: de nas de'i chung ma'i tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:368a-7: bu mo'i tshogs thams cad yud tsam gyis 'ongs nas thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:368a-8: bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kun //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:376a-7: mdor na tshogs rnams mngon du bsgrub //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:376b-4: gzugs dang lugs chen dung mchog ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:376b-5: ci 'dod snang bar bdag gis dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:376b-6: 'jigs byed dbang du bdag zhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:376b-7: khro mo ji snyed 'khor du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:376b-8: bar chad ting 'dzin mchog gis zlog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:376b-9: gsang ba'i snying por nyid bshams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:376b-10: 'das pa bdag tu mnyam sbyar zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:376b-11: thugs kyi sngags kyis spyan drangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:376b-12: bdag gi lus la thugs tshul du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:376b-13: de yi gzugs gzung mchog tu bstim //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:376b-19: yang na sa gzhi rab mnyam la //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:376b-21: lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:377a-7: zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:377a-8: drug cu dgu bcu rtsa drug tu //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:377a-14: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378a-1: byed chen po sngags kyi bzlas pa snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dam tshig chen pos phung po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378a-4: skye mched sbyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te 'dug pa'i tshogs byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378a-5: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta padma sa ma yo gi ni dza zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi snying po kun tu padmar gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378a-6: dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa las dbu dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378a-8: de nas yang dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs pa zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378a-9: ri rab chen po brkyang bskum gyi tshul gyis 'dril zhing aom aa bhi tsa ra ba sh'i na zhes brjod pas lha'i tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378a-14: mi ma yin pa ji snyed pa thams cad rang dbang med par zhabs 'dril ba'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378b-0: de nas @378b yang ha ha aa pi ra tsa tishtha zhes brjod pas la la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378b-1: lus shin tu brjes te ri rab chen po'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378b-3: mngon sum gcan mar ri rab chen po'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378b-4: de nas yang sa 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba gdug cing zhe sdang che ba dad pa med cing rdo rje theg pa smod pa zhig yongs kyi 'jig rten na gnas par mkhyen to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378b-5: mkhyen nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas aom padma sa ma yo gi ni ru lu ru lu ru lu h'um zhes brjod pas kun tu sku chags pa'i bdag nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378b-6: kun tu gsung chags pa'i cha lugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378b-7: kun tu thugs chags par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378b-8: kun tu rin po che chags pa chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378b-9: kun tu 'phrin las chags pa chen por gyur te shar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378b-13: dbus chen por khrag gi dba' klong keng rus chen po'i ri rab chen po na dus kun tu de nyid snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378b-14: de yang kun tu sku lnga 'jigs pa'i gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378b-15: kun tu gsung lnga'i nga ro bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378b-16: 'jigs byed bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:378b-17: kun tu thugs lnga'i rol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:379a-1: gyis mi khyab psa' 'jigs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:379a-2: rigs lnga tshom bu chen po'i steng du gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:379a-3: de las mchog gi snying po chen po mah'a ratna ti la kha'i dbur gyur las rab tu sku gsung thugs spras pa'i gzhal med khang na 'jigs byed chen pa'i theg le snying po nyid dbu gsum phyag drug tu gnas te gnyis su med par bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:379a-4: de nas de nyid du sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:379a-7: 'khor stong khams kyi rdul snyed du 'jigs byed chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par khebs par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:379a-8: de nas yang bdud chen po sa 'dzin gyi rgyal pos skyes bu chen po sa 'dzin gyi bdag po thong thong ji lta bu byed dam zhes pa las de nas yang dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:379a-9: aom aa bhi tsa ra ba sh'i na h'um h'um h'um zhes brjod pas dam pa'i bstan pa rdo rje theg pa spyod cing 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor pa la gnod pa'i tshogs 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:379b-0: yang g-yog tu bcas pa'i bdud chen po de dag nyid kyi yid kyis gdungs te rab tu brgyal nas ma mthong bar rmongs pa'i gnas nas rang dbang med cing dran pa med par keng rus kyi ri rab chen po'i 'og zhabs kyi gnas su phyin par @379b gyur to; ;de nas 'jigs byed chen pos tishtha badzra aam aam zhes brjod pas gdug pa'i blo dang phral /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:379b-1: mi mthun pa'i lus brjes te lha chen po'i tshogs 'dul ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen por gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:379b-2: de nas dgyes pa chen po'i dpal 'jigs byed chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor sgyu 'phrul chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las las thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thig le chen po zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi rdo rje thig le chen po'i dam tshig sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:379b-4: aom// khrag mang dba' klong 'khyil ba yi; ;keng rus tshogs kyi ri rab 'bum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:379b-5: 'dus pa'i tshom bu lnga yi ri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:379b-7: gru chad bzhis brgyan rab brjid pa'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:379b-8: gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:379b-9: 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380a-7: 'bar bas phyag bsnams chen po ni //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380a-10: zhing gi zhags pas 'ching ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380a-12: btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas; ;gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380a-13: sgo bzhi phyag rgya rab mdzes par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380a-14: bran mo'i tshogs chen mang po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380a-15: 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis gnas par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380a-16: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gdug pa'i tshogs byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380a-18: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380a-19: byed pa rdo rje mchog nyid kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-0: da ba'i dkyil 'khor ma'i @380b rdzogs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-1: 'jug pa'i yid kyi dgongs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-2: shin tu phra la sbyangs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-3: dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-4: tshom bu gnyis kyi bye brag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-5: spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-6: yid du 'ong ba'i sa gzhir ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-7: rkang mthil thig gdab dkyil 'khor bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-8: aom dang mum gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-9: de las phra mo rdo rjes dgang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-10: phra rab sa rdul mthil du gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-11: yum gyi tshogs su shes pas brtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-12: gang gi yul yang dbang du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-13: mi mthun gzugs su brtags pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-15: lugs ma bzhin du ham du brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-16: de las 'od bzhin mthil du gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-17: gsang gnas ngag lam ham du bya; ;rlung zla'i steng du mkhas pas gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-18: drag po lce yi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-19: gling khams gzhan du shin tu gtang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-20: bdag nyid h'um gi tshogs bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-21: ma skyes pa yi yi ge bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-22: bya ba chos khams de yi tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-23: mum du byin brlabs yi ger bstim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-25: nam mkha' bzhin du shin tu bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-26: brtan 'gyur aa yi snying po bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-27: nyams su lon par ma gyur tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-28: 'jug pa'i yid dang nyams su sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:380b-29: dang po'i gnas su shes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-0: @381a *// rnam pa mang por mnyam du 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-1: de las mi snang gzugs zhi ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-2: rab tu blo yi theg gnas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-3: gzhan du nam yang mi bstan cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-4: gzhon dang spyad dang 'tshong la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-5: longs spyod rnam par sbyor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-6: rdzas kyi nor phyir ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-8: nam yang sbyin par ma gsungs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-9: smad pa bam gyi gter bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-10: sus kyang byin par ma gsungs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-11: srog chags khva yi gtam bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-12: nam yang smra bar mi bya 'o; ;byed pa rdo rje gsha' yi tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-13: bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi gling bzhi'i lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-14: kun tu bzang po'i thabs tshul ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-15: tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-16: chos khams bya ba aa yi tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-17: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gleng slong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-18: kun tu bzang mo shes rab tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-19: gsha' la ye shes thugs kyi thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-20: tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-21: de ni chos khams aa la bstim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-22: chos kyi chos bya ba yi dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-23: kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-24: de yi ngang du tshogs kun brtags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-25: sa chu me yi 'byung ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-26: de yi dbyings nas 'byung bar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-27: 'dod pa'i bdag la shin tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381a-28: mi gnas nam mkha'i mthas klas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-0: goms @381b par 'dod pa thod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-1: chu las sa bzhin 'gro ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-2: bsreg bya 'bar ba'i dbus gnas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-3: tsha ba rlung gis bteg nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-4: phyogs bcu kun tu phyin par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-5: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-6: rdo rje snying po las thams cad kyi le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos gsang ba'i snying po 'di brtan par 'dzin pa'i don ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-8: de nyid chos dbyings mnyam sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-9: sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-10: ksha lam aa yi tshon bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-12: lugs su blugs mi bzhin du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-13: de nyid yid lam mchog grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-14: de nyid gsal bar mnyam sbyor las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-15: sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-16: aom lam aa yi tshon bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-18: lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-19: de nyid gzugs lam mchog grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-20: de nyid mnyam nyid mnyam sbyor las //
