K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-22: aom l'am aa yi tshon bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-24: lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:381b-25: de nyid khyad par lam mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-0: @382a *// chos dbyings rtogs pa mnyam sbyor las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-1: sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-2: aom l'am aa yi tshon bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-4: lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-5: de nyid gsum mchog grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-6: chos dbyings bya ba mnyam sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-7: sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-8: ham lam aa yi tshogs bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-10: lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-11: de ni 'phrin las ye shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-13: dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-14: rtse bcu rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-15: de nyid ha dang ksha nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-16: mum gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-17: sangs rgyas sgyu 'phrul mchog nyid las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-18: dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-19: de nyid h'um lam phyag bsnams pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-20: rtse bcu rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-21: yang na rtse lnga thugs kyi thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-22: dbus nas h'um gi lo tsa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-23: lcags kyu 'dzin par rgya bcings shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-24: h'um h'um h'um gis lan gsum du; ;rang lus ngag yid byin gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-25: mum gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bskul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-26: 'bru lnga rgya bcings byin gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382a-27: bskyed pa rdzogs par gsor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-0: @382b bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-1: zhi ba rgyas pa lan gsum gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-3: bcu pa drag po mthing nag dbur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-4: 'gying ba'i gar gyis gsor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-5: gsung snyan sgra yi bro rdeb pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-6: phyag rgya brgyad du sbyor bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-7: phat phat h'um gis gsod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-8: snying po thugs brtags phyag bsnams pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-9: sku gsung thugs kyi rgyal po las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-11: ci 'dod re ba thob par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-12: brgyan pa sgeg pa pho nya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-13: tshangs pa dbang po 'dod dbang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-14: mdor na bcu gnyis gling gi bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-15: drag shul mthu yi dregs pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-16: sngags shing brgyal te blo stor nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-17: bum pa bzang po 'bul bar gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-18: lha mo klu mo brgyan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-19: rta dang glang po bzhon pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-20: gnas dang rten dang bgo ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-21: gtsug na nor bu yod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-23: de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-24: de yi dgos pa thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-26: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:382b-27: sgyu 'phrul chen po brtan par gzung ba bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i le'u ste sum cu brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thugs @383a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-1: rjes 'gro ba 'dul ba bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-3: ye nas rnam dag chos sku la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-4: log rtog rnam pa gnyis su 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-5: thams cad 'byung ba lnga las skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-6: thams cad gtsang zhing dri med las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-7: rnam rtog mi mthun so sor gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-8: la la'i sman la la la'i dug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-9: sman du ma gyur gang yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-10: thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-11: mi mthun khyab par so sor snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-12: sus kyang ma byas su byed yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-13: rnam rtog zhags pas so sor bcings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-15: khams gsum phyin ci log bzhi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-16: dus gsum 'gro lnga thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-17: nyon mongs sdug bsngal thams cad sbyong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-18: rnam par thar pa lta rdzogs byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-19: sa bcu rdzogs shing sangs rgyas sa yang rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-20: de phyir sman 'di bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-21: kun la phan pa'i sman yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-22: de phyir nga dang bdag ma 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-23: gtsang dang sme ba'i blo rtog bor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-24: thams cad mnyam pa nyid du spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-25: rtsa ba byang chub sems nyid rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-26: thabs kyis pha rol phyin la spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383a-27: snying rjes chud ma zos par gyis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383b-2: bdud rtsi gnas ni byang chub sems //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383b-4: bdag dpal tshogs shing 'gro don mdzad; ;sman gyi byin rlabs bsam mi khyab //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383b-6: gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383b-7: gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs 'grub; ;rkyen las byung ba'i dug rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383b-8: rtsa ba'i dug dang sbyar ba'i dug /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383b-12: dkyil 'khor ma lus tshang par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383b-13: gnas lnga dag tu 'bru lnga bstim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383b-15: yang na yi ge aom gyis bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383b-16: yang na yi ge hr'i las gtang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383b-17: dug rnams bdud rtsir 'sgyur bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383b-18: mnyam pa'i dbyings su thim par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383b-19: aa ho rdo rje gsang ba'i chig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383b-21: h'um/ bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383b-22: thugs rjes rtog bdag 'dul bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383b-23: nga dang bdag med dbyings sbyor zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383b-24: byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383b-26: aom// bdag nyid gti mug chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383b-27: ye shes 'od zer gsal ba'i ngang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:383b-30: tr'am/ bdag nyid nga rgyal yon tan te //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384a-3: yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384a-5: hr'i:/ bdag nyid 'dod chags gsum mchog ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384a-6: nyon mongs las rnams dag par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384a-7: nyon mongs sdug bsngal rnam par dag /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384a-10: bdag nyid las kyi sems dpa' ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384a-11: don rnams ma lus grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384a-12: log rtog ma lus 'dul ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384a-15: mum/ bdag nyid shes pa 'od gsal te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384a-16: le lo g-yeng ba sel bar byed //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384a-22: lam lnga sbyong pa ye shes lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384a-23: 'khor ba'i rtsad gcod shes rab mtshon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384a-24: h'um du bsdus shing ho:yis g-yeng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384a-25: ram gyis bsregs shing phat kyis 'phangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384a-26: thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384a-27: thig le'i dbyings su thim par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384a-28: de nas gnyis med dbyings gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384a-29: ye shes sems dpa'i sku ru bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-0: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis @384b ma lus dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-1: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-2: nga med bdag med phyag rgyar gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-3: de las longs spyod lnga kun dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-4: ye shes lnga dang rigs lnga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-5: lha mo lnga dang sman lngar bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-7: aom badzra aa mri te kunda li ha na ha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-8: aom bi shuddhe aa mri te h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-9: aom dharma aa mri te h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-10: aom a'a:h'um ces brjod pas thams cad dag par gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-12: sa chu me rlung nam mkha' rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-13: rang bzhin med par gzhig pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-14: gcig la lnga lngar dbye bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-15: mum gyi dbyings su bstim par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-16: 'byung ba che rnams de dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-17: lhag pa'i ting 'dzin bskyed par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-18: rig pa thabs kyi phyag rgya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bsgom zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-20: 'byung ba so so'i mtshan nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-21: yum lnga dag tu bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-22: de rigs ye shes lnga nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-23: rgyur byas gzugs sogs bzhi bcu gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-24: phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-25: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-26: de ltar gyur cing skyes pa kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-27: smos ci dgos te de nyid yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-29: ae ma'o lhag pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-30: bdag la lha rnams bsdu bar bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-31: de nas lha dang gnyis med nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:384b-32: bdag nyid yi ge aom dang mum//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-2: bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil bar bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-3: sku mdog gangs ri nyi shar 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-4: zla ba padma gdan khri la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-5: nyi ma stong gi gdan khri ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-6: lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-7: khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-8: gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgyas mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-9: slas dang byi mo'i tshogs kyis bskor; ;aa ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-10: 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-11: dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-12: shar gyi rtse la rdo rje 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-13: lho yi rtse la rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-14: nub kyi rtse la snang mtha' yas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-15: byang gi rtse la don yod grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-16: thabs dang shes rab ldan par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-17: phyag rgya rnams kyang gsal bar bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-18: snying po 'bru tshig gsal bar bzlas; ;de la bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-19: bum pa gang ba yid bzhin 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-20: re ba yid bzhin skong bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-21: nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-22: 'dod lnga yon tan ldan par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-23: dngos grub chen po bla med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-24: bdud rtsi char bzhin 'bebs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-25: sgo bzhi phyag rgya ldan par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-26: aa mri ta yi rgyu nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-27: byang chub sems dang sha chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-28: dri chu dri chen m'am sar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-30: gzhan yang don yod sna tshogs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385a-31: dbye ba'am yang na mi dbye bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-0: bdud @385b rtsi nyid du byin gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-1: rtog pa'i bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-2: gtsang sme med par dag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-3: dbyings su yang ni bstim par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-4: phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-5: dug gsum sdug bsngal med pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-6: bskal par yun ring gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-8: tshogs gnyis rdzogs par yang dag gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-9: bdag nyid yi ge h'um gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-10: longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-11: aom a'a:h'um du gyur par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-14: shin tu gsal zhing rtse gcig bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-15: gzhan yang yi ge'i tshogs pas gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-16: 'thung na ngan song sgrib pa byang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-18: rtag bsten dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-19: bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-20: lha la rtag tu mchod byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-21: bdag dang gnyis su med par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-22: mi mthun phyogs la gtor byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-23: drag po gtum po'ang lhan nor 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-24: gzhan yang dngos grub thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-25: ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-27: lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-28: the tshom med par sgrub par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-29: rtag tu spyod cing dbyings su thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:385b-30: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-0: @386a *// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sman sgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-1: de nas dgyes pa chen pos de dag byin gyis brlabs 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-2: de la mchod sbyin dam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-3: 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid; ;khams dang 'byung ba nyid la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-4: de gnyis sgyu 'phrul thabs mkhas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-5: dra bas mngon rdzogs sku gsung thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-6: thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid; ;chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-7: phyogs bcu gang bar gsal bar bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-8: de nyid ngag lam kun khengs bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-9: h'um gis tshogs su rnam par bsgom; ;lus nyid ha yi tshogs la bstim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-10: gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-11: kha dog nag po'i tshon phye yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-12: de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-13: dza zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-14: mgyogs su 'gro bar lcags kyis spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-15: dri rno snga bas mgyogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-16: gang du bya ba byin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-18: zhi bas bdag gi gzugs bzung la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-19: dal bus h'um zhes bsdus pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386a-20: bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386b-0: thams cad ma lus @386b phyag rgya nyid //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386b-21: sv'am gyi tshogs su rab tu bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386b-22: lus nyid sv'am gyi tshogs la bstim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386b-23: gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386b-24: kha dog ser po'i tshon phye yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386b-25: de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386b-26: sv'am zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386b-27: nor mang blon po yid mdzangs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:386b-28: blo rno snga bas longs spyod 'du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387a-0: @387a *// de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387a-20: bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387a-23: phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387b-0: de nyid ngag lam @387b lus khengs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387b-1: ham gyi tshogs su shin tu bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387b-2: lus nyid ham gyi tshogs la bstim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387b-3: gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387b-4: kha dog ljang khu'i tshon phye yis; ;de yi snyid nang bdag zhugs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387b-5: ham zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387b-6: las kyi rigs chen gang 'dod gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387b-7: dmag mang mthu dpung go mtshon bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387b-11: de yis bstan pa 'dzin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387b-12: de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387b-13: gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387b-15: snyoms pas khro yi gzugs bzung la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387b-16: dal bus ham zhes brjod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387b-17: mi snang ba yi gzugs su 'char //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387b-18: bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387b-19: gling ngam dur khrod gnas rnams su; ;nga yi 'dod pa chos dbang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:387b-22: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-1: dpal kun tu bzang pos nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i phyir 'gro ba'i sems can gyi don ched du de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-2: dpal nyid kyi mchog rigs kyi yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-3: dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-4: spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan; ;'bru lngas byin rlabs m'um du brtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-5: de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-6: m'um gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-7: de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las; ;de bzla'i ngang tshul de bzung na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-8: sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-9: shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-10: lam du zhugs la de lus dgang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-11: de goms blo bde gsal spro thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-12: de bzhin rigs rnams aam du bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-13: snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-14: yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-15: phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-16: rigs dang mthun par rnam par bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-18: rnam shes byin rlabs ngang du brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-19: gzhi rtsa med ba'i sems nyid las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-20: yid bzhin yi ge'i sprin tshogs bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-21: phyag rgya shin tu gsal ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388a-22: nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin par bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-1: bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-2: lcags kyu mchog gi phyag rgya bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-4: rang bzhin sku gsung 'dus ma byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-5: gzhan dbang ma yin rdo rje rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-6: dpal ldan rdo rje sgyu 'phrul yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-7: shin tu chos kyi bsgrags pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-8: gsal bar 'dod pa smra bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-9: spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-10: 'bru lngar byin brlabs l'am du brtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-11: de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-12: l'am gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-13: sangs rgyas spyan gyi sbyor ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-14: rgyal ba thams cad byin gyis rlob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-15: de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-16: rang bzhin mchog gi gzugs bcas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-17: sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-18: shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-19: de las rdo rjer byin gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-21: sbubs nas zhugs la de lus dgang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-22: de goms blo bde gsal spro thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-23: rdo rje rigs rnams h'um du bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:388b-24: snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas snying po bsam @400b yas bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-1: 'bru gtor bsdu ba las ni 'das bzhin bsnyags dka' ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-2: ma nor las chen gcig gis rab tu 'dul 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-3: de yi bsngags pa'i bka' las 'da' bar ngas mi nus; ;thugs kyi thugs rjes ji srid ma nor lam nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-4: gsang ba'i snying po nges ba sgyu 'phrul mchog nyid pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-5: nga nyid 'dod 'gyur gzhan lta smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-6: de nyid thugs las sprul pa'i thugs nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-7: ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-8: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-9: shin tu 'dul bar gyur pa gnas dang snying po dbul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i spyan sngar dregs pa chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-11: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis sems 'dun pa chen por gyur te ched du bstod pa'i glu 'di mgrin gcig tu smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-12: ae ma'o ya mtshan 'phrul chen gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-13: sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rang bzhin dpal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-14: dug dang bdud rtsi khyad med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-15: dag pa'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-16: kun tu bzang po rdo rje'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-17: ye shes lnga yi khro rgyal gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-19: sangs rgyas mtha' yas 'gro ba rgya mtsho 'dul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:400b-20: thugs rje bsam yas khro rgyal kun gyi gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-0: khrag 'thung kun las ches 'phags yid bzhi @401a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-2: ser nag mthing nag ljang nag dmar nag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-3: sngo nag ri rab lta bur brjid pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-4: bskal bar bcas pa'i me ri'i dbus gnas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-5: ro tshogs mang po'i dkyil nas zhal rdam pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-6: bsod nams lus bsdus rdo rje mi bzad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-7: skar tshogs mang la nyi zla'i 'od bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-8: che btsan dregs pas 'jigs pa'i tshogs kun 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-9: mtshungs med cho 'phrul khyad par rab ston cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-10: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gar gyi tshul du bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-11: za byed skam pas thugs sku gsung gi zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-12: khrag mtsho mtha' med skem shing sgal tshigs 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-13: khro gnyer snying 'dren 'jigs byed glog ltar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-14: ngur khrod 'bum gyi dbu smug 'jigs par brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-15: 'khor ba'i rtog pa 'jig mdzad thod rlon phreng bas sge //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-16: rol phyir rtse mor snang bas aa aa ha las bzhad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-17: rang nyid che bas dbang rdzogs rgyal bas dbu la brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-18: smin ris khro gnyer glog bzhin rab 'gyur sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-19: phyogs dang mthun pa'i khrag 'thung 'gyed cing sdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-20: sprul pa de lta bus ni zil gnon pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-21: 'jigs pas mun pa'i tshogs chen rab bshams kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-22: sdang mig spyan ni nyi zla rgyas 'bar bas; ;'jigs pa'i tshogs phung sdug bsngal gtan nas sbyong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-23: khros pas zhal gdangs so chen gtsigs 'bar bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401a-24: srid pa'i rtse nas dmyal khams snyegs pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-0: 'jig rten @401b dus gcig mid mdzad lam drug gtan nas gcod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-1: ye shes phyag bsnams phyag mtshan 'bar ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-2: srid gsum ma lus rdul phran stongs par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-3: rkan sgras rol bas 'gro la pheg brdabs bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-4: khams gsum kun la chos ston rgyas par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-5: zas su khrag 'thung rdo rje che mchog gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-6: 'jigs tshogs bsad pa'i ko rlon g-yang gzhi bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-7: klu 'dul yon tan sbrul nag stong gis klubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-8: 'jigs bcas klu yi tshogs kyang zhabs 'og mnan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-9: 'dod chags 'dul ba 'dod chags kun gyi gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-10: 'dod chags chen po 'dod chags nyid kyi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-11: mang po'i 'khor bcas 'jigs pa'i 'khor du byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-12: zhe sdang 'dul ba zhe sdang kun gyi gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-13: zhe sdang gdug pa zhe sdang kun gyi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-14: 'jigs pa'i tshogs rnams zer gyis kun bzhu ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-15: rab tu brjid pa 'jigs pas 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-16: gti mug 'dul ba gti mug kun gyi gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-17: gti mug blo sel gti mug chen po'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-18: mched lcam khrag 'thung sran chen ri rab brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-19: nga rgyal 'dul ba nga rgyal kun gyi gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-20: 'jigs tshogs bsad nas ro tshogs mang gi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-21: zhabs bgrad mche gtsigs cho ga pa'i dus mtha' med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-22: 'jigs pas phebs par dga' zhing shin tu sdang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-23: phrag dog 'dul phrag dog kun gyi gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-24: phrag dog che mchog phrag dog chen po'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:401b-25: bud med kun bsdus dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-2: zhing gi sham thabs gdug pa 'dul bar bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-3: sku 'dra 'jigs tshogs gzugs kyis sku la brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-4: zhabs dang phyag tu gyur pa bsam thag chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-5: zhabs chen g-yon mang brkyang pas lha gnon bdud la khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-6: zhabs g-yas thabs chen mang pos dbang sdud 'dor zhing bskum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-7: rdo rje se gol 'phyar brdabs gnyis cher rab sel mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-8: 'od chen dbus nas glog chen rab 'gyur ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-9: 'jigs par gong na med pa'i dpa' bo khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-10: zas ngan bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i sman chen bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-11: 'jigs byed khyod lta bu ni rab tu dkon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-12: bskal par bkrus kyang slar skye dri ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-13: ye shes nyi zer 'od kyi byin rlabs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-14: thugs rje dag pa'i char gyi cho 'phrul gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-15: brda tsam yud la rmongs 'khrugs las spyod zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-16: shi ba'i lam 'gog shes rab dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-17: skye ba gtan nas sbyong ba'i thugs rje 'char //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-18: byams sdang mi mnga' bka' drin chen po'i gter //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-19: khrag 'thung sku gsung thugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-20: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-21: bka' drin dran pa'i glu zhes bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402a-23: 'jig rten gyi khams su gnas par bya ba'i ched du 'byung po rnams kyi jo mo'i yang jo mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-0: @402b mi srin mo chen mo mi srin mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-25: ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-26: bum sna sngo nag chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-27: gsus 'dzin ser nag chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-32: bran dang yang bran la sogs pa slas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-34: bran mo rnams la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-35: gsang ba'i snying po nges pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-36: gsang sngags kun gyi rgyal po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-37: thabs chen mtshon pa'i shes rab ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-38: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i snying po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-39: gsang ba rgyud ni mang po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-40: nga yi thugs las sprul pa yin; ;tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-41: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-42: sde dpon 'phrog ma'i yul rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-43: lus 'phags pa lang spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-44: sgra mi snyan dang 'dzam gling du; ;nga yi thugs kyi snying po 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-45: phyogs bcu kun tu spel ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-46: de yi gzugs la gtad pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-47: yid bzhin mdzod 'byor bka' yi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:402b-48: phyi nang theg pa bstan bcos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-0: @403a *// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-1: spyod dang sgom dang 'das pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-2: sdom pa kun la mkhas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-3: sgom pa sran dang chos phyogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-4: bstan pa 'dzin par nus pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-5: gsang ba'i snying po mchog tu gtad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-6: gzhan la bsnyad par ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-7: mi 'khrug blo zab rkyen thub cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-8: yid bzhin sbyor bar mos pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-9: rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-10: zla dang bcas pas dam tshig che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-11: sbyor ba gnyis ka mkhas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-12: lung dang tshad du ldan thub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-13: gzhan la bsnyad par mi byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-14: bstan pa mchod par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-15: nye ba bsnyen pa dam tshig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-16: sgrub pa bsnyen pa nye bsnyen pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-17: ci nus par ni shin tu brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-18: sems can ngang tshul kun bor nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-19: gang gi yid kyang mi 'khrugs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-20: mchod pa tshogs la stobs la rub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-21: bud med 'gugs pas gtso la dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-22: zung thub gsang la mkhas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-23: nges pa can la shin tu gtad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-24: gzhan du bstan par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-25: thogs med phyal bar 'dod pa spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-26: bud med yon tan kun yod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-27: 'dod chags kun dang mthun spyod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-28: rtsa ba dang du blang pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-29: 'tshal bar bya yi sku bstan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-30: nye bsnyen gsang ba'i man ngag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-31: nam yang sbyin par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-32: de la sbyor stangs de bstan nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-33: gzhan ni bstan par ma gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403a-34: dad ldan srun cing blo rno ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-0: dad pa @403b che zhing chos la gus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-1: chags par ran pa bka' nyan cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-2: gnas la dga' zhing lus nyan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-3: rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-4: mchod pa'i gnas shom sgom pa srung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-5: bsnyen pa la ni byin phab nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-6: gsang sngags tshogs kyi mchod gnas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-7: nga yi gsang ba byin phab ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-8: thogs pa med par mngon sum la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-9: sbyor ba'i thabs ldan mnyam sbyor ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-10: dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-11: bdag nyid mnyes pa'i mnyam sbyor zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-12: mnyam pa'i grub pas tshogs la mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-13: dam tshig mi ldan spyod rtsing dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-14: gting nas bstan pa mi 'dzin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-15: 'dod chags spel bar mi byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-16: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-17: nges pa'i don ni mi ston la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-18: nga yi dbang dang bslab pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-19: rim pa bzhin du rab tu sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-20: rigs ngan pho mo 'dod spyod ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-21: spro thung 'dod chags rab tu che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-22: blo zhan phrag dog sgro skur can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-23: gnyid che chang dang brtson 'grus chung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-24: slob la mi gus nan tan med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-25: slob dpon mi dran spun sems chung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-26: gal te dam la gnas na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-27: nga yi gsang ba 'dzin pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-28: mngon du dga' bar mi nus te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-29: lta zhan bka' las 'das pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-30: grol bar dka' zhing nus mthu zhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-31: mun dang lkog dang skye bo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-32: gar dpen phrad par 'dod spyod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-34: tshig rnams gsang ba smra byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-35: dngos po don dang mthun pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-36: gsang ba'i snying po sbyin mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-37: bskal pa'i 'jig rten bar du yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-38: thugs kyi bde ba mi spro zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:403b-39: nam yang bstan par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-2: gal te rmongs pas byin pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-3: rims dang nad kyis srog bcad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-4: rtsa ba yan lag spangs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-5: bsregs dang sbrengs par yun ring gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-6: zhes brjod pas srid pa mtha' dag gi bud med kyi tshogs rnams dam tshig 'dis 'dul bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-9: ae ma'o chos rnams sgyu ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-10: ngang nyid bud med gsang bsngags pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-11: lnga drug dus btab snang srid 'byung ba'i gter //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-12: yang dag lam rnyed mngon par kun gnas kun tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-13: chos mang chos nyid mnyam pa'i phyag rgya ji snyed las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-14: las ngan dge ba'i cho 'phrul lam chen 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-15: kun gyi khyad par nyid ni bud med bde ba gcig pu yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-16: chos kun de nyid yin phyir dman pas mi smrad 'tsham par bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-17: sgyu ma 'byor pa nyid ni bde bar gshegs bnyid yin rab tu gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-18: rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-19: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-20: dam tshig chen pos bud med btul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-21: de nas bcom ldan dgyes pa chen pos mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-22: de la mchod sbyin chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-23: thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bsgral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-24: de nas gnyis med blo yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-25: blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404a-26: gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-0: @404b 'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-1: bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-2: mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-3: bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'bul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-4: bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-5: longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-7: phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-8: bder gshegs yon tan rmad po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-9: gzhan na yod pa ma yin na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-10: lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-11: rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-12: phyag rgya chen po rdzogs gyur cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-13: gsal ba'i yid gnyis med pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-15: zhes brjod pas mnyes pa chen pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-16: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-17: mchod sbyin gyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos don yod par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig chen po ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-19: bla med theg par nges gyur pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-20: nyon mongs las rnams kun spyod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-21: byas la mi sogs tshogs gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-22: tshul khrims sdom pa phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-23: bla med mchog gi dam tshig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-24: 'dul ba'i dbang du tshul khrims dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-25: ji snyed sngom pa bsam yas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-26: ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-27: yod med dbu ma'ang mi dmigs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-28: sgyu ma mig yor lta bu'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-29: srog med srog gcad gcad du med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:404b-30: srog dang skyes bu log rtog tsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-0: bden pa gnyis kar dbyer med @405a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-1: pas; ;'phrul dga'i tshul de tha dad min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-2: gzhan dang ma byin med pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-3: blangs med thams cad nyid kyi dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-4: chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-5: ming dang tshig tu btags pa rdzun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-6: rdzun nyid la ni rdzun spyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-7: rdzun spyod btags tsam yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-8: ma chags pa la chags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-9: chags pa nyid na chags pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-10: de ni tshangs mchog rgyal po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-11: shin tu chags pa chen po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-12: bla med mi spang bla ma bkur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-13: sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-14: yang dag lam du zhugs la byams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-15: gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-16: 'di ni rtsa ba lnga rnams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-17: bsgrub dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-18: gti mug chags dang zhe sdang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-19: nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-20: dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-21: dag pa'i snod du mi dor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-22: yan lag bcu yi dam tshig mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-23: ye nas dag mnyam rtogs pas spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-24: bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-25: rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-26: mi spang mi dor lnga gnyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-27: yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka' ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-28: mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-29: mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-30: mnyam rdzogs chen po thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-31: 'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-32: rtsa ba nyams pa'i phyal ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-33: gso la nye bar mi brtson dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405a-34: skad cig yud tsam smra mi byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-0: nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod @405b mi lang; ;rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-1: sgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-2: yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-4: yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-6: dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-8: rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-9: gcig la'ang gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-10: yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-11: gcig la bcu phrag gnyis su dbye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-12: dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-13: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-14: srid gsum 'gro ba ji snyed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-15: rtog 'dul dam tshig de snyed spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-16: gzhan yang rgyal mchog kun bzang gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-17: thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-18: sgrub med dam pa ma lus 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-19: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-20: rgyal ba'i rigs mchog 'dzin pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-22: dam pa'i mchog dang dam pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-23: sras dang spun dgongs byin gyis rlobs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-24: bder gshegs nyid kyi yul la zhugs; ;'jigs med kun tu bzang por spyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-25: ji bzhin nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-26: ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-27: ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-28: nyams na bskangs pas rdzogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-29: de la sogs pa bsam yas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:405b-30: ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'dul bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-0: gsang ba'i snying po de kho @406a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-2: dam tshig gi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig sum brgya pa'i rtsa ba mdor bsdus nas sngags 'chang rnams kyis don ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-4: phyogs bcu 'jig rten rdul snyed du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-5: log rtog mi bzad rdul phran snyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-6: rtog 'dul gnyen po bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-7: 'dul ba sdom pa bsam yas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-8: rdo rje theg mchog mang po kun; ;nyid las g-yog shing spros med kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-9: rang rig 'khrul pa'i rtog pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-10: lta ba mtho dman bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-12: yang dag nyid dang log rtog gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-13: ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-14: de la bcos shing bsgyur du med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-15: ye nas ngo bo nyid med na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-16: nyon mongs spangs shing don bsgrub med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-17: thams cad ma lus ro gcig 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-18: kun rdzob chu zla ltar yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-20: rnal 'byor de nyid rtogs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-21: don dam skye 'gag med pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-22: kun rdzob sgyu ma cir yang 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406a-23: ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-0: dam tshig sum brgya drug cu pa'i rtsa ba bco lnga pa mdor spyad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis @406b pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas thugs rdo rje rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-2: nam mkha'i mkha' dkyil dang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-3: yid bzhin sprin tshogs rnam par 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-6: ram/ srid gsum sreg pa'i me yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-7: yid kyi ye shes me ru 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-8: ham; dbang po dang pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-9: spyod yul rdzas rnams bsdus nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-10: lhan ne lhang nger 'od du zhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-13: thugs rje byin rlabs rmad po che; ;h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-14: 'gro ba sna tshogs don byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-15: 'di ni byang chub mchog tu gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-17: bzhi po 'joms shing ngan song sbyong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-19: sman bcud len gyis dug sbyong bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-20: phyi dang nang gi dri ma dag //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-21: bdag med gnyis kyis dag par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-23: bsal zhing gzhag par bya ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-24: nyi ma shar ba'i 'od bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-25: snang dang mi snang gnyi ga med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-26: de bzhin mnyam gnyis ye shes kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-27: thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-29: aom// rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-30: phyogs bcu khams rnams dbang bsdus chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-31: thams cad mi dmigs dbyings su thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-32: thams cad khro bo'i tshogs su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-33: rtog pa rnam bzhi mi dmigs dbyings gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-34: shes rab yum gyi mtshan nyid dbyings su thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:406b-35: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med dbyings gyur pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-0: @407a *// chos rnams thams cad dbyings kyi khro bo khro mor 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-2: rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-3: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-4: chos thams cad khro bo dang khro mo'i rang bzhin du gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-5: rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi me sbyong ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi rgyal po'i 'bar ba'i thugs rjes gtum 'khrugs ging tshogs chen por bsgyur nas thams cad 'od dpung 'phro zhing 'bar bar bstan pa ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-7: sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-8: phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-11: gtum chen dus mtha' me ltar 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-13: ram/ nyi ma'i thod sbrul mang po'i gzi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-14: khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-15: rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-17: phat/ khros pa'i sprin chen phyogs bcur 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-18: khros pa'i me dpung rdo rjer 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-21: khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kyis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-22: gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-24: slas dang bran mo byi mo'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-25: rang gi stan dang mal cha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-26: ci bgyi zhes te chas te gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-27: sti ra rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-28: nri yi tsi ta za zhing rgyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-29: shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs su gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407a-30: ral pa mun dza cod pan 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-0: phyogs bcur khebs @407b pa'i gshog pa gdengs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-1: rdo rje gtams pa'i brag ri 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-3: ram/ so so'i rig sngags skad gdangs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-4: skad dang nga ro drag tu 'don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-5: h'um he he phat bhyo ru lu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-6: khro bo chen po tshogs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-8: bdag nyid gnyis su med par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-9: so so'i rang sngags bzlas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-10: rgyud drug sems can thams cad las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-11: ma rungs gdug pa thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-12: dza:h'um bam hos bkug nas ni; ;lan gsum lan bdun zhal du bstim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-13: lha rang rung ste brlag par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-15: ho:/ gzhan yang mchod pa'i zhal zas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-16: 'byor pa rnam pa kun gyis mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-17: ni yi tshil dang tsha ba'i mar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-18: dmar gyi aargham rgyun du dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-20: yang na lan gsum brgya rtsa brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-21: stong dma' bum du dbul bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-22: nag po'i tsher ma dug shing ngam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-23: gzhan yang bsreg rdzas bdug gsum dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-24: gnon pa'i chog kun gyis bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-26: thugs rje rol pa'i dkyil 'khor sbyir bstan pa'i hom://
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:407b-28: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:408a-0: @408a *// drag po gtum po sgrub pa ni //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:408a-29: 'dren pa'i mchog tu des gsungs so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:408b-2: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po las thams cad rdo rjer bsdus nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:408b-19: phat dang h'um dang ha la sgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:408b-20: skad drag phyogs bcur nam mkha' 'khrug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:408b-22: phat/ khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kyis bskor //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:408b-25: slas dang byi mo bran mo dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:408b-34: rgyud drug sems can kun bsdus nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:408b-35: khro bo'i tshogs la dbul bar bya //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-0: gtum 'khrug gdug @411b pa ma rungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-1: lhan ne lhang nge zhi par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-3: aom;/ gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-5: aom dang seng+ge mgos bskor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-6: brgyan pa'i rdo rje phyag rgya kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-7: rdzogs ldan zhi bas bskor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-9: rgyan rnams zhi la dkar ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-10: byang chub mchog 'bar lhan ner bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-11: mkha' la rgyu dang bar snang 'phyo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-12: gzhan yang 'gro drug ma lus kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-14: gar dang glu yis mchod byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-15: phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-16: gdug pa'i yid ni rnam bor nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-19: gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-21: skad cig yud la zhi mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-22: zhi bar ma gyur gang yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-24: thams cad ma lus par zhi bar gyur nas zhi ba'i hom gyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-25: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-26: ae yi tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-27: 'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-28: khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:411b-29: sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-1: lnga 'am; ;mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-2: bkug nas rdo rje phur bas btab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-3: rdul du byas nas tshogs la dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-4: ae yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-5: lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-6: bcings 'gyur bskyod na phyogs bcur g-yo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-7: myos nas gal te tshig par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-8: bam gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-9: 'bar ba gzi brjid lhun chen la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-10: chags pa yid kyis mchod sbyin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-11: rdo rje gsung yang dbang du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-12: bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-13: mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-14: rdo rje chags pa'i phur bas gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-15: chags pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-16: bam gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-17: lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas bsdams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-20: ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khro mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-22: dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-23: yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-24: bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-25: yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-26: nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur pas gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-27: rdo rje gzi brjid 'phel bar dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-28: ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-29: lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412a-31: yid bzhin nam mkha' gang bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-0: ya yi tshogs kyi @412b dkyil 'khor mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-1: gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-2: dang ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-3: gtum chen rngam pa'ang lhan nger 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-4: bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-5: gtum rngam 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-6: lhan ner gsal ba'i phur bus gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-7: 'bar ba lhan ne'i tshogs la dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-8: ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-9: lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas bsdams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-10: 'bar ba lhan ner byin gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-11: thams cad g-yo ba med par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-12: slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-13: lhag ma'i mchong sbyin 'dod pa sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-14: gang gi dam tshig rab bsgrags nas; ;gang 'dod las de byed par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-15: sngon che dpal chen he ru ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-16: shin tu gdug cing gtum bag can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-17: thams cad ma lus 'dul mdzad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-18: dbang dang byin rlabs rmad po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-19: lha chen la sogs dbang bsdus nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-20: 'khor rnams dbang phyug slas su byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-21: so so'i las rnams bskos pa de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-22: ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-23: ma thogs myur du mngon par phyung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-24: dam bcas bzhin du ma byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-25: ji ltar rang gis mna' bor ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-26: sdom bcas de las 'da' ma byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-27: dam tshig de las 'das gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-28: mgo lus snying yang tshal ba bdun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-31: ji ltar bcol ba bzhin du byos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-32: las de mngon du ma byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:412b-33: rang gis mna' bor khas blangs bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-2: rnal 'byor dam la gnas gyur pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-3: las rnams yongs su bya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-4: 'khor rnams bu gcig bzhin du skyongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-5: phra men ma yang dngos grub 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-6: bcol ba'i las rnams mngon du byos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-8: khro bo sgrub pa'i las kyi gtso bo ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-10: khrag 'thung chen po la sogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-11: bro gar glu tshig chen pos ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-12: thams cad thams cad byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-13: mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-14: bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-17: sbos mo chen mo la sogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-18: bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-19: lhan ner 'dod na thim par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-20: rmugs par 'dod na myos par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-21: seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-22: bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-23: thams cad kun tu za bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-24: rdul cha tsam yang med par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-25: bzhad gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-26: bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-27: thams cad kun la za bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-28: kun la rab tu nyams par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-29: slas dang byi mo bran mo yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-30: bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-31: rbod cing gtong bar byed pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-32: thams cad thams cad byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-33: ljon pa dang ni lcug phran tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-34: sdong gcig dang ni me reg tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413a-35: dang ba dga' ba chags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413b-0: khros pas ka li rab @413b tu bya; ;zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sbyong bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413b-1: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413b-2: lhun gyis grub pa'i 'phrin las byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413b-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las chos thams cad yid dang chos su 'dus par bstan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413b-6: yum bzhi yang gcig tu 'dus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413b-9: rigs bzhi yang gcig tu 'dus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413b-10: thams cad dbyings dang dbyings kyi ye shes su 'dus par bstan nas tshig mgo mjug gi don bsdus nas yang 'di skad brjod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413b-11: don gyi rtsa ba'i mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413b-12: thams cad ma lus mi lus mi dmigs ma chags chos nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413b-13: de bzhin dbyings nyid mang po sna tshogs thabs su snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413b-14: thabs nyid sgyu ma mig yor chu zla gzugs brnyan yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413b-15: de nyid rang rig ye shes chags med sna tshogs snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413b-16: thabs dang shes rab ldan pas mchog gi gnas gyur pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413b-17: ji ltar spyad kyang zad med gnyis med sgrib mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413b-18: shes rab thabs chen mchog la ye nas rol pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413b-19: de nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs sprul pa rang rig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:413b-20: rgyu 'bras ye nas dbyer med snga phyi ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-1: 'bras bu lam du gyur nas dus gcig mnyam par sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-2: 'di ni yid bzhin rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-3: thams cad 'du ba'i gter dang yid bzhin mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-4: gnyis bral mnyam dang mi mnyam thams cad nyid kyi dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-5: nga dang bdag med mtshan ma sna tshogs dbyer med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-6: stong dang mi stong mi gnas de bzhin nyid du 'dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-7: rang byung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zad med dkyil 'khor spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-8: 'das dang ma 'das dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-9: mi zad par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo drug rdzogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-10: skye med dbyings kyi rang byung 'od gsal phreng ldan mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-11: ye nas ma bcos ma byas rang rig dang gis gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-12: thams cad 'byung 'jug rang rig gter chen dang du bsdus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-13: phyogs bcu ma lus mi lus thams cad kun 'dus dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-14: zhing khams gzhal yas bsam yas rin chen mchog chen kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-15: skye med dbyings dang rang gi gnyis su yang dag 'ubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-16: mos spyod stong nyid rgyu 'bras yang nas yang sbyangs mi dmigs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-17: ye nas 'od gsal chags med ma chags dkon mchog gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-18: ming tsam mchog rol thabs dang shes rab mchog gis rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-19: lam stegs nyid du pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs par rgyu 'bras spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414a-20: mnyam nyid pa yi rdo rje thabs chen yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-0: 'gro @414b med 'ong med mi gnas kun khyab khyab med nyid kyis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-2: rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-3: pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa yid dang chos su 'dus par bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes lnga'i dkyil 'khor la mnyam par bzhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-8: lnga phung yan lag thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-9: 'bru lnga gnas pa'i byang chub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-10: aom dang m'um du 'brel ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-11: byang chub rdo rje nyid las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-12: spyir na brjod pa thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-13: kun kyang ming tsam yi ge aa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-14: skye 'jig nyid kyang yi ge lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-15: de ni byang chub sems nyid yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-16: dmigs med byang chub mchog 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-18: zad med rin chen gter yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-19: mngon shes drug ldan mtshan bzang spags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-21: gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-22: nam mkha'i dbyings nas sprin byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-23: kun la khyab cing sna tshogs sprin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-24: bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i khong nas bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-25: byin rlabs ya mtshan rmad po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-26: yon tan mi zad gter du gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-28: ye nas mnyam nyid gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-29: dbyings las mi gzhan ye nas thig le dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:414b-30: ye shes dbyings nyid gzugs brnyan sgyu ma'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-0: @415a *// snang byed nyid na bya byed med par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-1: ye shes 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-2: dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub dam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-3: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med mnyam par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-4: dag mnyam rnam gsum don rtogs bsgoms byas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-5: mnyam pa rnam bzhis don rtogs mchog gi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-6: rgyu 'bras lhun grub phun sum tshogs bzhir 'dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-7: ye shes lnga rdzogs sku gsung thugs kyis bsdus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-8: chags med zhi ba'i lam nas thig ler 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-9: ye shes lnga rdzogs spyod yul mi 'da' la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-10: ma chags 'od gsal dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-11: thams cad ma lus rang rig rgyal po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-12: dkyil 'khor dag mnyam khro bo khro mor sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-13: chos rnams rang bzhin nyid kyis stong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-14: nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-15: rnam rtog sna tshogs 'dzin pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-16: dngos po med dbyings skad cig ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-17: de nyid rnam par dag pa'i lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-18: phyin ci log nyi yang yang dag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-19: ma rig pa ni ye shes gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-20: nyon mongs sdug bsngal byang chub mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-21: thams cad yon tan mchog gi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-23: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-24: nges pa'i don dgrol bzhi bcu rtsa lngar 'dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-25: bsdus pa'i don nyad yi ge 'bru lngar bsdus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-26: lnga po'i don snying 'bru gsum nang du 'dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:415a-27: gsum po de nyid yi ge aar 'dus te //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-004:419a-1: rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
